Reviews.Author: Katgirl2
Reviews.Content: I used my Kindle Fire for 2 years before getting my Kindle Fire HDX.  I always loved my 'regular' Kindle, but love the HDX even ,ore! It loads much faster, is more clear and has more GBs than the older model.  I can now take pics and store/edit/save them - I didn't realize how much of a difference that makes to me (even if I can only take the pics from the front of the Kindle with this model).  It was super easy to transfer the books that I had purchased from one device to the other. . . I was happily surprised.I do not like the one and only cover option for this newer tablet.  I have knocked it off a few times, as it is only 'held' on by magnets (it IS nice that it folds into a stand, though).  I am not taking any stars off of my rating because of the cover.I would buy another one in a heartbeat, if needed - it is that nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Ley
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new Kindle HDX.  I got it for Christmas and have read more books since getting it than I've read in a year.  They're much cheaper and accessible.  Plus I can read in bed while my husband sleeps since I don't need to have a light on anymore.  I can get on the Internet quickly and don't have to drag around my big laptop.  It's also convenient for checking my email.  The only draw back is that the camera lens is on the front (facing you) so the only thing you can really do is take selfies, which I DON'T do.  But it does take great pictures as long as you can aim the lens just right.  Other than that it's great!!

Reviews.Title: I love my little computer!

Reviews.Content: I love the smaller size (same size as my older Kindle). I can easily take it wherever I go. Lot of free apps (Facebook, email, games; skype, movies and TV shows, Netflix, the web, Amazon shopping, and many more). I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX 7"!!!  Cheryl Metz

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janet P Brown
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle! Ease of downloading, perfect size and weight. Great for reading books and listening to music. Also great value for the price.

Some apps I really enjoy on my android nexus 5 I can't get on the HDX without sideloading.  I don't feel like I should have side load.  The HDX has a front facing camera, but lacks a rear facing camera.  All in all it's okay, but I feel I could have done better with my 200 bucks by getting a nexus 7.

Reviews.Title: HDX

Reviews.Content: Awesome awesome really awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome totally awesome really cool so awesome it's really impressive and amazing you should get it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"

My only complaint is that book print is not as large as my old Kindle. I received it as a gift and have used it since the first day.

Reviews.Title: It has been an exception purchase

Reviews.Title: Far more than a reader
Reviews.Author: John Kovach
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a reader for books when I travel.  What I got was a full function tablet that is easy to use, light with an incredible display.  This device is far more than I expected.  I am incredibly happy with my Kindle Fire HDX and use is much more than I had expected to.

Reviews.Title: Love IT!
Reviews.Author: P. A. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" does everything an iPad does, but cheaper.  I really do like the bright sharpness of the Kindle.  I love it!!

Reviews.Title: I'm really enjoying my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Rick Scherer
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the larger screen. It's nice to have the speech recognition ability also, just found that. Much easier to use than a laptop. I'm really enjoying my new kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX my favorite toy
Reviews.Author: jujamsamsu
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle Fire HDX.  The only thing that I would like to see is a larger screen at the same price.  THE FIRE HDX IS DOING EVERYTHING THAT WE WERE TOLD THAT IT WOULD.  I really like the help button.  It's great that you can see who you are talking to. Keep up the great work Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great small tablet
Reviews.Author: Andrew Vittoria
Reviews.Content: I have had the Fire for about a month and love it. It's easy to use, has tons of apps and books that arevery reasonably priced. The screen resolution is perfect. All that and under $175. What's not to love?

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I started with a Kindle Fire and loved it for reading new or revisiting books I hadn't read in some time.  The new Kindle Fire HDX is a great advancement over the original.  Portability, ease of use, can go from reading a book to surfing the web or watching a Netflix video seamlessly. The Silk browser is a huge leap forward from the Kindle Fire and is very fast and responsive. The only con I have found so far is in the native e-mail application.  It works extremely well but it does not have a "select all" option when you need to move or delete e-mail, you have to select each one individually.  This is a minor quibble but would make the mail app shine (yes I know I have other options).  Now if I could just convince my significant other that the HDX 8.9" would be even better (or the 10" when it becomes available...)

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "lilimarlene9"
Reviews.Content: I can do anything I want on it. I only wish I had spent the extra money & gotten the 3G option also.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift Ever
Reviews.Author: robert carter
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present.... To date this has been the best gift she's ever had... Her words... The help feature is awesome! Live person interaction on your screen is truly awesome... I strongly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle!
Reviews.Author: Angelina Urena
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's so easy to use. No looking up the manual, just turn it on and go! The colors are vibrant the sound amazing and thousands of books and apps to choose from.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like it.  I haven't used it for everything that I could be using it to do but so far so good.  I have to get used to it.  I haven't read any books on it as I'm still using my old Kindle for that.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: mmk
Reviews.Content: When I bordered the Kindle Fire HDX,  I was using a desktop computer, a laptop, a Kindle Paperwhite, and an Android tablet. It was time to simplify me electronic life. And this has done it all. I love this device. It's sleek, light, fast, clear easy to use, and I have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Didn't seem to work very well.
Reviews.Author: Drastic
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this device because of the specs and the large amount of hype it received Upon using the device it had unprecedented slow-downs/freezups. I tried reloading it and the issue remained. The other issue I was receiving was sometimes the battery life would be great other times it would die in less than 3 hours from a full charge and no use. Note that this would occur regardless of apps running or not. I think my device was faulty so I returned it for a refund.However I can say the following things :The app selection is not great and typically very expensive in-app purchases. The only thing that has a reasonable price tag is Amazons own content ( books etc. )All in all it felt well build and the sound and screen where great.Not recommended for someone looking for a stock android device.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Deborah Hanson
Reviews.Content: I just love love love it. I got it for Christmas . It is all and more than I hoped it would be. I am an no means a computer person, but it was so easy to navigate. The graphics are terrific. So clear even for a little screen.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: KatKat
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with my Kindle, the only thing is that it turns off sometimes and it bugs me.

Reviews.Title: Replaced Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Janiece
Reviews.Content: This replaced my Kindle Fire HD which I gave to my daughter.  While the tablet is as described and is great, the battery life is HORRIBLE!

Reviews.Title: a bit disappointed
Reviews.Author: Charles Marion "C S Marion"
Reviews.Content: very limited apps and functionality. I was expecting something that would at least run android apps. the screen is absolutely amazing though and as a media viewer can't be beat.  I would give it 4.5 starz if they would just tell you what apps work or not before you buy and install them.

Reviews.Content: Without 4G as part of the package it is almost useless when needing a Wi-Fi all the time.I live in the country, must use satellite to download, does not work as well as my old Kindle with 3G

Reviews.Title: Kindle  firee hdx 7
Reviews.Author: William R. Little
Reviews.Content: Difficult to use, and understand. Appears to be a pathway for more purchases. Lack of instructions a big problem. Thank you

Reviews.Title: lllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll

Reviews.Content: I have to take it out of the case if I want to turn it on or adjust volume. Case that was recomended sucka.

Reviews.Title: Financial institutions not available; game applications did not transfer with previous progress.

Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle so that I could use it in lieu of my AT &T; Smartphone.I purchased the Kindle for its convenience in price, size and memory advantages.Very dissatisfied that the majority of the applications are not available; and those that are do not transfer over to the Kindle from where you were on your Smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: nancy niemiec
Reviews.Content: I use it daily & love it.  From now on all the books I read will be on my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: its the best!
Reviews.Author: Allison Hart
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  It replaced my original Kindle which was thicker and heavier.  The graphics on this Kindle are amazing and the HD quality is excellent.  On top of that, having Amazing Prime lets me watch movies & TV shows as well as borrowing a book each month (Geez!  I sound like a commercial, but I love this thing!!!)

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Eryck
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product and I recommend it to anyone. Definitely a 5 star rating from me. A must buy to.

Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Content: very happy with performance, app availability, and convenience!glad i didn't spend more for i-pad or any other tablet.only wish yhat i had gotten the larger version

Reviews.Title: My review for my kindle.
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I would love to give 5 stars. But I'm a little disappointed that I can't do certain things due to not having all capabilities to do so. Like some games I like playing. I guess I need flash to play. But other than that. A great tablet. Also. Would of been nice to have front camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Robert Glasspoole
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX on time and love everything about it.  The Wi-Fi works well and I can check "E" mail and Facebook as well as play games and read books,

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "winnielss"
Reviews.Content: I can now carry more than one book when I go travel without putting too much weight in my suitcase. More importantly, I can read while my boyfriend is asleep right next to me without turning the light on. It was the best Xmas gift for me!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Grace Roderick
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my kindle but it will freeze from time to time. I would tell my friends about it.

Reviews.Title: INSTRUCTIONAL FLAW
Reviews.Author: thomas a cappelloni
Reviews.Content: I AM NOT TECHNICALLY SAVVY.  I WOULD HAVE NEVER PURCHASED ANY DEVICE LIKE THIS.  IT WAS A GIFT FROM FRIENDS WHO ARE DETERMINED TO DRAG ME INTO THE 21ST CENTURY.  I EMBRACED IT.  I HAVE TRIED TO USE IT, AND HAVE ENJOYED THE THINGS I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIND.  THE BIGGEST PROBLEM FOR MYSELF AND MANY LIKE ME WHO CAME THROUGH COLLEGE AND GRADUATE SCHOOL WHEN COMPUTERS WERE HOUSED IN AIR CONDITIONED ROOMS, AND DATA WAS ENTERED ON PUNCH CARDS ---IS--- THERE IS NO USEFUL WAY TO FIND OUT HOW TO USE THE NUMEROUS FACITS OF THIS DEVICE.  THE TUTORIALS ARE VIRTUALLY USELESS.  SO THE DEVICE IS OF LIMITED VALUE TO ME.  I NEED AN INSTRUCTION APP THAT STARTS WITH A PICTURE THAT SHOWS YOU HOW TO TURN IT ON, AND DOES EVERY FUNCTION FROM THAT POINT.  YOUR INSTRUCTIONS ARE GEARED TO PEOPLE WHO HAVE COME UP WITH THIS TECHNOLOGY FROM KINDERGARTEN.  AND SO YOU LOSE AN ENTIRE MARKET BASE AMONG THE 50-70 YEAR OLD PEOPLE WHO WOULD LIKE TO USE A KINDLE, BUT DON'T HAVE GRANDCHILDREN OR GRADE- SCHOOLERS TO GIVE THEM TUTORIALS.

Reviews.Title: Almost there...
Reviews.Author: XJCraver
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet. Handy for checking emails, forums, and such, and very easy to use.  BUT.....Amazon and Google have GOT to get their heads together, and come up with a way for me (and others) to access the Android apps I've ALREADY PAID FOR in the Play store.  It's ridiculous the amount of functionality you lose not being able to access those apps.  If I could link this thing to my Verizon phone, and have all my Play store apps on this thing, it would've got 4 1/2 stars instead of 3.  Very disappointed that I have to hack this thing to be able to use it to it's potential.  And before you go all "read about it before you buy it" on me - I received this as a gift.  I had no choice in the matter...The other 1/2 star it's lacking is an easy fix, and it flat boggles my mind that Amazon didn't include it in the programming  -  NO HAPTIC FEEDBACK OPTIONS?????????  That's basic, kindergarten-level stuff some programmer left out, and it's beyond annoying.  Really would make this thing much more user-friendly if these buttons gave me some feedback when I touched them.So overall,  3 stars.  I'd be fine with recommending it as a purchase, just do your research first and make sure you can do without your Play Store apps.  And do NOT gift it to someone, unless they're on their knees begging.  There are similarly priced tablets out there that will much better suit the average Android user.

Reviews.Title: getting better but not the best...
Reviews.Author: Darlene Farley
Reviews.Content: Simple to use and quick tech support. Great size and storage, added camera is nice if your into facetime or Skype but not for taking an actual picture of something! It freezes often and won't load when connected to the web, I always have to disconnect the WiFi and wait a few seconds and then reconnect the WiFi to correct loading issue. This is my second kindle, first one stopped charging because the port became loose. If your kindle needs repair good luck finding an affordable repair place! It was almost cheaper to just by a replacement kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Dolores Hannum
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. Never thought I needed one. Did not want anymore electronics to keep charging. BUT I find I was wrong. I LOVE my Kindle Fire!!!

Reviews.Title: Santa brought this for my Daughter

Reviews.Content: She Loves the KindleHDX and my Husband wants one for himself. We still need to purchase a case and screen protection but haven't had any real problems playing the KindleHDX. It has a crystal clear picture and the sound on it is Awesome too.  Thank you for this wonderful creation.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Terrie Franklin
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle.  There are so many more things I can do with it that I could not do with my basic Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Content: The graphics are bright, and clear.  Easy to use and manuever around the internet.  Great for reading, and playing games.  Has decent sound quality for easy music listening.  This is my second Kindle Fire.  My first one was 1st generation.  Moving up and if Kindle continues to keep up like this I would get another one in a couple of years.  Love my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: love my Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: packfan1Montana
Reviews.Content: Excellent speed fast internet easy to use I don't even use my computer much any more its portable  just love it

Reviews.Title: So fun!

Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift.  I'm really enjoying using it.  I find I read far more and enjoy reading even more. It certainly does everything I would use a tablet/reader for and with the wireless keyboard I purchased separately-its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: golf4ever
Reviews.Content: Battery life is not as advertised. Other than that it's a nice tablet. I will be going back to Apple when I need a new one.

Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Content: This is an amazing tablet. The color is off the chart. It's easy to use and offers many apps. If you are a beginner or expert. I would recommend this Kindle to anyone looking at tablets. This was my best Christmas present ever.....

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle is a HDX 7

Reviews.Content: I really like my new HDX 7. I don't mind that it is only wifi. I can down load what I need at home and take it with me to where ever.I like the easy down loads. I've enjoyed some games on it. I have been able to Skype with it and I use it to check the Weather Channel. I do a little Face Book time and it works well for that too.Money well spent I think.

Reviews.Title: this thing rocks!
Reviews.Author: Clinton Gray
Reviews.Content: I love it so far. The battery does not last as long as advertised when watching video but that's a minor problem.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: carolyn gibbs
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle Fire and it's so much better than the first one. It's thinner and light weight, small enough tocarry in my purse. The colors are richer and sound is much better. The built in camera is so nice and takes anexcellent picture. I would recommend this 7" HDX to anyone who loves to read or play games. The E-mail apptis much easier to read. I have no negative comments.

Reviews.Title: Depends on what you want.
Reviews.Author: ann wilson
Reviews.Content: To tell the truth I like my old original Kindle better.  The new Fire is harder to read a book on because of the glare of the pages.  Much prefer the old one's easy on the eyes screen.  I don't like the dictionary at all.  You have to page through from a to z to find the word you want.  Waste of time.  I don't much care for the games that are available.  I like word games.  I play several every day such as crossword and Scrabble on my old Kindle.  The choice of games on Fire are mostly juvenile ones with sound effects which are irritating and most of them will only let you play a game or two without paying the company who created them more money.  On the old Kindle you pay for a game up front and play to your heart's content.  I also don't like how frequently it needs recharging - even when it's just sitting around doing nothing it needs a recharge in no time.  I do like that I can pick up my email without starting up the computer. I can check it while I'm sitting around watching TV, etc.  However, you can't trash the email on your computer from your Fire, so you end up trashing it from the Kindle, then when you get into your computer, the emails are still there and you have to go through the process again..  I also don't like the front only camera.  It's very hard to take a decent picture with it because you can't see what you're focusing on.  Perhaps going up to the next level would have been better, but that was a great deal more expensive.  I'd say this is an okay device if you like to play the games a lot, don't use the dictionary very much, either don't read a lot of books or have young eyes.  But if you have an old Kindle you like for reading, word games , the dictionary and thesauras, stick with the black and white.

Reviews.Title: I do like it!!

Reviews.Title: I love the Kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle

Reviews.Content: I love my kindle, I just wish I could get to read more I am now enjoying the book I'm reading...

Reviews.Title: Simple, elegant, usable.
Reviews.Author: Oneyedphotog
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is simply perfect for me.  I use it mainly for reading, watching videos from prime, surfing the web and of course playing Angry Birds but not necessarily all in that order.  The "Silk" browser is aptly named as it is rather silky web browsing much improved from my first generation Fire.  The screen is really brilliant and the colors are very rich even when it is in low bright mode; I use the auto brightness most of the time.  The sound quality is good and the size of the tablet is nice as well.  It's built to be dedicated to Amazon services but I uses those services so it fits me fine.  The price is really perfect and it offers a lot in a good package.  I'm very happy with it; not a replacement for my Mac but it is perfect for what it is designed for.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire as a Christmas gift from my husband and I found it is so useful for me- light, bright, keeping me connect to Internet, able to read without glasses :), and easy fit in my pocket or/and bag.

Reviews.Title: Love!

Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire hdx! It's very easy to navigate. It's makes reading so much better than just picking up a book.

I'm not a huge fan of the advertisements on the lock/security screen, but It's not a huge drawback.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Courtney Champy
Reviews.Content: I like the brightness and quality of the display. The speed is pretty good and it is easy to navigate.A very big turn-off is the lack of customization, I like my own backgrounds and now when I am not at home reading I cannot look at my dog which is relaxing and makes reading more enjoyable. Unfortunately the next model may have this but an upgrade that enables this would be phenomenal, as it is an expensive purchase and I cannot investing in the newest version for one change.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: staci pullinger
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use! Fast downloads for apps. I would rate it 5 stars.  The clarity and HD are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: A great gitf from the kids for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Susan oleneack
Reviews.Content: I chose four stars because I wish I had asked for the larger version. 7" is just a little too small. Otherwise, I am very pleased with this Kindle version and appreciate the special offers and the mayday button. Great for this baby boomer Mom who isn't as tech savvy as the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: katt 3woman
Reviews.Content: Love the games and books but still have trouble writing messages.  Good size and weight.  I think it's a good tool for all ages.  My 11 year old granddaughter has one and she likes hers too.

Reviews.Title: My Comment
Reviews.Author: Roger Turner, L.
Reviews.Content: First, I am a new user of the HDX - I expect, after I become more knowledgeable about the device, my rating will improve. One of the first things I tried to do was download the User Guide - so far, I have been unsuccessful - it has simply taken too long and it times-out. It seems reasonable that there should be an easier (faster) way.  While I am computer "literate", it has been slow finding my way around all that the HDX offers.One of the reasons I selected the HDX was the availability of the Skype App.  When I installed it, however, Skype advised that they were blocking my account - because of a break-in that occurred in 2010. Everything was resolved by Skype and my bank, and I have been using Skype on my desktop ever since.  Working with Skype to unblock my account was endlessly frustrating.A minor point. I have used Every Word: Crossing on a previous Kindle.  I expected to use it on the HDX. However, after searching the Kindle website, I finally determined it was not compatible with the HDX. Subsequently, I purchase (it was free) the App Every Word - and received confirmation.  However, it was never delivered.  Your helpful tech determined that (again) it was not compatible with the HDX.  Not a crises - just a bit irritating.I have not yet used the Amazon Assist feature yet - but I think the offering is excellent.In one of the reviews I read before selecting the HDX, the reviewer commented that the On/Off button was in an awkward place - I agree.Thank you for the opportunity to comment.

Reviews.Title: Mayday
Reviews.Author: murray johnson
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to give a little praise to the Mayday people. Called them at 0430 hrs, CST , on 28 Jan. They came on line quickly, were very polite and knew exactly what to do about my problem. I only wish I could remember the young lady's name that was so helpful. I was back up and running within 5 minutes. Excellent job people. I have the technical abilities of a toad and she patiently stayed with  me until I got. By the way I own 3 of the Fire, 2 of the HDX's. Thanks for the help.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: svetlana
Reviews.Content: Got a Kindle Fire HDX 7 for Christmas!!!! great for watching videos doesn't buffer or blur!!!! also the mayday is very helpful

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Donna L Wood
Reviews.Content: This was the best purchase I have made. My Kindle Fire HDX has proven to be the best tablet I have own. It's far better than the iPad. All of the apps that I need for my work were easily downloaded for a reasonable price. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas gift and I love it. I use it everyday and it holds a charge for a couple of days.

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Content: I resisted buying one of these because I wanted to support my local book store.  Now that I got my Kindle Fire HDX, I read more and always have an assortment of books to read whenever I want.  The convenience is the best!

Videos are of the highest quality, making viewing an absolute pleasure!  Great price too!  Who needs an iPad when a Kindle Fire HDX offers so much more?

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: val7777
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14 year old grandson, and when his friends saw it they laughed at him and told him it was gay.  Then they checked it out for themselves and fell in love with it.  They all asked their parents for one too!  It is a wonderful gadget!

Reviews.Title: YAAAAAAAY
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Vold
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS THING. LOVE IT. Great selection of apps, great resolution, and very user friendly. If only it supported Flash...

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: H. S. Miller "insatiable reader"
Reviews.Content: I have gotten every 7" Fire as it came out.  All have been a pleasurable experience, but this HDX has exceeded all my expectations by far!  I was reluctant to get it as I only expected a software update and a few added gizmos.  I had hoped they would include another camera on it too, but no.What pushed me over the edge in purchasing it was a $50 coupon sent to me as a Prime customer, plus the knowledge I could sell my older HD Fire and recoup even more of the purchase price so it seemed to be worth a major software upgrade, all by itself.WOW!  Holy computational power, Batman!!!  I am more than delighted with this 7" HDX!  The total difference between the older Fire HD generation one and this Fire HDX is amazing!  Incredible value here!  My only regret is that it doesn't support Flash, but neither did the HD unless you sideloaded Dolphin, and for the most part I can do without having Flash on it.  I do hope a software upgrade will enable Flash videos on it, and soon, but with the outstanding performance and speed of the HDX as it is, I can live without having Flash.  Besides, what a lot of people don't realize is, if you use any other OS (in order to view Flash) rather than the Amazon version, you lose all the great benefits of Amazon's cloud loading and storage, which is part of the reason for it's speed and super flexibility.This HDX is a true world-beater.  I can't imagine what even newer models could provide in addition except another camera on the 7" model.  I have not used the Mayday help feature, but since I've used Fires from the very beginning I'm used to handling the OS.  I can see where the Mayday help feature could be absolutely invaluable to a beginning purchaser, though.  You get help on the spot and instantly.

Reviews.Title: Great Device - Compact & Fast
Reviews.Author: Harry C Mounts
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something small and compact, yet powerful enough to download and stream fast. I found it in the Kindle Fire HDX. This is such a versatile computer, I find myself NOT using my smartphone or laptop pc. Picture quality is great, fast downloads, fast streaming, plenty of apps to choose, and it's a great device to read those novels you've been wanting to download. I've had the Kindle for six weeks now and use it daily - not one problem. Very satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Only One Complaint
Reviews.Author: Reva M Wamsley
Reviews.Content: I love this except for one thing.  I can't get through a whole book without having to recharge it.  I had a Kindle touch before & I could read maybe two books without having to recharge.  But other than that, I love it.  The color is great, I love the lighted screen & being able to access the internet to check my email & Facebook.One other slight problem is that I have it in a case & the on off switch on the back is a little awkward to get to. But on the other hand, it won't get pushed accidently there.

Reviews.Title: Greatest Tablet I have ever used
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had every kindle fire since they have been released.I always thought they were great for what they were - a great discount tablet that got the job done while also having access to all of my amazon content.This kindle fire hdx blew my mind.  This is one of the highest quality tablets I have ever used.  I argue that this is just as nice as my mother's iPad.  The device is fast.  The OS has major improvements.  That was always my issue with past kindle fires.  The OS was slow and buggy and the browser was awful and you couldn't organize apps very well.This is all changed.  You can organize apps beautifully.  The amazon app store finally has enough apps where I am satisfied (even though it is still lower than google play and the apple app store, it has everything I need).  The silk browser is awesome on this device.  Even if I had the opportunity, I wouldn't switch to another browser.I have not used the mayday button because I am pretty tech savvy, but I am considering getting my grandfather one solely for this reason.If you have any doubts about purchasing this, do it.  Especially if you are a college student.  Textbooks are so cheap on the kindle store, you can highlight and make notes in them, and it syncs to all of your other kindle devices.This device is light. and when I say light, I argue that it weighs about the same as my smartphone.  I can hold it in one hand with ease all day.The battery is not as good as past kindle fires, but I can't complain because of the performance increase.  I can still get a full days use out of it as long as I am not constantly watching videos.  Also - being able to download prime videos to the device is awesome.Overall, I would highly recommend this device to anyone and everyone.  You won't be disappointed.  Great job amazon! - Keep it up.

Reviews.Title: Comments on the Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Bob Smyser
Reviews.Content: I don't like the front cover.  I would have preferred a hard cover.  It also shuts off right after I turn it on, even after a full charge. It seems to run alright when I start it up the 2nd. time.

Reviews.Title: Great all around tablet
Reviews.Author: nicholas
Reviews.Content: Love it!! first tablet easy to use easy to download apps n has a great section to pick from from kids games to business apps

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle
Reviews.Author: Betty J Wood
Reviews.Content: Love , Love, Love it.  Light and easy to hold and read. It totally met my expectations a must have.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I bought two. One had the difficulty mentioned in other reviews - turning off often. MY husband contacted Amazon & they talked him through a fix. No more problems!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX delivers
Reviews.Author: Shawn M. Miller
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HDX, HD and Paperwhite.  They are all awesome.  If I could only buy one, I would buy the HDX, for the reason of versatility and the price difference between the HD and HDX with 16GB is only $60.  For $60, you get a faster processor, faster downloads, better screen and other enhancements.  If you are only going to use it for reading novels, then the Paperwhite is the way to go.  Very easy to use - if you use Amazon Prime this is the way to go.  If you don't, then only the Google Nexus and ipad compare with this device; I would look at those two before deciding to purchase.

Reviews.Author: Just W
Reviews.Content: Second best packaging behind the Google Chromecast.The changes in the HDX vs the HD are very practical. From button placement to OS layout.Kindle's major flaw is software. Obviously Amazon & Google are competing in the device market. But as a Kindle owner, you lose out on access to Google apps. This is huge. The Kindle apps tend to be two or three versions behind their Google Play counterparts. The selection in the Amazon App Store is also much slimmer. Not getting some key apps from Google, Microsoft and other major developers. So if you are a power user, you might want to go with any other Android device.The screen resolution is really nice. Sharp and bright graphics. I've noticed an occasional brightness flicker. But nothing too terrible. Video playback is quick and clean. Easy to watch a whole movie on this.Really great speakers. Too bad there was no space for them on the front. The way that tablets are designed, no manufacturer really want's to take away screen space for speakers.Three things I want to see in the next version are:A return of the micro HDMI port. Who knows. I might use it one day.Upgrade-able memory.Replaceable battery.

Reviews.Title: my kids loved it...
Reviews.Author: Diana  Melissa
Reviews.Content: Very happy!!!! It was a Christmas presents for my kids and they love it I recommend not only for the games now they are reading more books

Reviews.Title: It would have been 5 stars except...
Reviews.Author: Douglas Dickerson "codougd"
Reviews.Content: ... for the annoying carousel and the fact that there is no way to disable it.Overall, the Kindle HDX is exactly as I expected and fits my needs, as planned and anticipated.The Kindle is NOT a "general purpose" tablet replacement or competitor. Its strengths are aimed squarely at us members of the Amazon ecosystem.It is a very good ereader. The color screen is crisp and, as a color screen, is more suitable for technical volumes than the B&W; Kindles. The is some glare in bright light but that is the trade-off for color.The included apps are good enough. I appreciate being able to jump to a browser to research something I encounter in book I am reading. The Silk browser is much improved over previous instances. The mail app is also good enough for casual use.I don't watch videos on the Kindle so I can't comment on the performance at that task. I have watched some video tutorials using the browser and that worked well.In all, if you accept that the Kindle is a media consumption device with hooks into and dependencies upon the Amazon ecosystem and if that is why you bought it you will be very happy. If you buy it as a cheaper alternative to other Android-based tablets you will likely be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: WIFI Connectivity
Reviews.Author: Lucy Cardona, Ph.D., LCSW
Reviews.Content: I was very ambivalent about returning the new Kindle Fire HDX 7" which I ordered one week ago.  This is because the HDX 7 has a great high definition display, is easy to use, and seemed to have better connectivity to the internet than did my old Kindle Fire. Today, I was at Starbucks, where I tried connecting to the internet through their free WIFI service, but failed to connect. I had not tried connecting in other environments other than in my home where I have high sped internet through a cable company. Thus, I ran into the very same connectivity issues that I had with my old Kindle. This was very disappointing as I had been reassured by the Amazon chat tech that the connectivity problems had been significantly improved (in the HDX 7'). For this reason, I made the decision not to order the 4G internet (Verizon) with it and ordered solely the WIFI connection for it. I am returning the device in the morning. I will explore other Kindle Fire products and likely order a more expensive model but this time, include the 4G (Verizon) with it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my Kindle

Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire is epic, every thing loads fast and so far every 3D app i've tried has had no problems. only two things i dislike: The Boot up time after you turn it off is slow, and the fact that i can't use Google Play.

The display is sharp as a razor blade, its size makes it feel great in the hand, or lying in bed reading. The UI is intuitive and fast. Lots of good apps.We have an iPad for a couple of years, and I really have only used that to surf the internet. The Kindle Fire HDX does surfing just fine, but as far as I am concerned it blows the iPad away when it comes to making reading books and magazines comfortable.I was a little worried about  "Special Offers" but they barely even get in the way.So impressed!

Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Content: Birthday present for my daughter.  She absolutely loves it! This is an awesome tablet at a great price; highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire hdx !
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad 10inch. I wanted a smaller tablet but did not want to spend all that money ona iPad mini. I have a co-worker who has a Kindle HDX 7 and she loves hers so I decided to get one myself and so I'm so glad I did. I love that it's a size of a book n it works absolutely great. I love amazon n I'm a prime member. I love to read books n the Kindle fire it's so easy to carry around. I love that there are lots of movies you can download n watch without wifi. So if you go on a trip you can down load some movies or tv shows n watch them anywhere. The kindle fire has a clear beautiful screen. It's great to play games n also it has two speakers n that makes a difference. some people say that the speakers are not that loud. I have an iPad with one speaker n the Kindle sounds a lot better. I also like the special offers, it's nice to see what deals are going on. They only appear when you wake up the Kindle. Once you swipe to activate the Kindle there is no interruption with the special offers. I'm really enjoying the Kindle fire hdx. I'm not disappointed at all. I like it more than my iPad. I purchased the 32gb. More than enough for me. I think it's a great buy n I would recommend the Kindle hdx. Hope this helps.

I love the internet access capability. I love the games. I love it that I can power it down when I am not using it. With that, I have to charge it about once a week.

I love the color, ease of use, portability, FreeTime, May day, everything is just awesome. I wish it had a rear-facing camera but I can live without that. I purchased a Bluetooth keyboard case to go with it and it's this fantastic little pseudo laptop I can carry in my purse! We bought a Nexus for my daughter and I thought I'd like that better but I don't.

Reviews.Title: Great Product for those not too technical
Reviews.Author: Bennie D Evans
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit for my wife for Christmas.  She has found the product to be extremely useful.  She had questions about some of the standard abs and using the machine and found the help system completely worthwhile.  The life support is quick and with answers.  In one case they took control of the screen and she found out how to use something.  Great product with great support.  I would highly recommend this product for those who are not too technical.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle fire Hdx
Reviews.Author: james e bell
Reviews.Content: Since I got the kindle fire hdx, I use it all the time. I am downloading and reading more now and the kindle books r a great price.

Reviews.Title: Sadly, the Kindle Fire HDX, like the Kindle Fire, is not very useable.
Reviews.Author: Higley_Pundit "HigleyPundit"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle version (my third) would easily be five stars, except that Amazon insists on doing everything they can to keep us from ordering apps from anybody but them. The Amazon store does not offer many of the most popular and useful apps; Google Play does, but Amazon has made it all but impossible for us to download them. True, we can 'sideload' some of the apps and we can 'root' the Kindle Fire(s), but that voids the warranty. Speaking for myself, it's time to pay close attention to what others than Amazon have to offer.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed ;-(
Reviews.Author: SoozyQ
Reviews.Content: I was excited to finally upgraded from the 1st gwneration Kindle Fire to this but after the third week of enjoying this new & improve HDX, I've decided to return it because it took ample minutes to connect to Wifi & I find myself always shutting it down & restart. The bizarre thing my old fire was working better/faster than this HDX:-( Don't get me wrong, this product is still my favorite than most tablet out it here perhaps I just got the ONE particular problematic device.

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: Dexter
Reviews.Content: Love it!, works best with the origami case. Better performance than Nexus 7, we also had a nexus 5 phone so nexus 7 would have been an overkill. Crisp HD display and excellent sound speakers make it your multi media partner. Haven't touched my laptop since I got one of these

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Diane S Bryant
Reviews.Content: This is the 7th Kindle I've purchased - 3 upgrades for myself, two for granddaughters, one for my life partner, and this one for my son. My son had a cheaper tablet and gave my daughter-in-law an iPad for Christmas, thinking that she would pass her Kindle on to him -- well, that didn't happen! My son is an avid reader, but hadn't given up his hard copies for eBooks yet. I ordered this one for him as an after-Christmas gift and also ordered the manual so that he could use it to it's maximum capacity. He is thrilled with his Kindle! The night it arrived, he Face-timed me so I could see my 19-month old granddaughter watching a movie on the Kindle while taking her bath. I always recommend the Kindle to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Beat my expectations
Reviews.Author: G. Tatmon "gtat"
Reviews.Content: I recently bought my wife an iPad Mini which she loves.  I figured why don't I try something different since my kindle broke, why not save money and by a Kindle Fire HDX.  The colors are great, the size/weight is very light and I'm overall very pleased.  I'm using the kindle mainly for reading and a few apps and I am very satisfied.  If you're looking at a device that has a lot of game play or for primarily apps this might not be for you.  If you like to watch movies occasionally and play a few games, nothing beats this!

Reviews.Title: this was a gift
Reviews.Author: june  heefner
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my sister which is 62 she cant stop thinking me so id say its a nice kindle.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Hardware, Handcuffed by Inferior Software
Reviews.Author: Nicholas J Littier
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at tablets for a while, and for Christmas this year I received the HDX 7" as a gift, but I finally made my mind up to return it in favor of another tablet.On the positive side, the hardware on the HDX is really impressive.  The processing speed and memory are among the best for 7" tablets.  The screen is fantastic, and even the sound from the speakers is impressive.  Another great feature is the ability to view Prime Instant Video.  Access to free movies and TV shows (some of them are even downloadable for off-line viewing) is an added bonus of having an Amazon Prime subscription.The tablet is also great for kids, or individuals who aren't very tech savvy.  Its very intuitive to use, and the parental controls are fantastic--even allowing parents to set a designated period of time that their kids can play with the device.  If you are a parent, someone who is looking for an easy-to-use device, or someone that simply wants to watch videos, read books, and play simple games, then the HDX might be your tablet.However, I was looking for a more traditional Android experience and I just couldn't get past the Fire's heavily modified Android operating system.  First, the operating system offers very few customization options.  For example, you cannot change the background screen, have access to widgets, or customize/organize your home screen as you would for other Android devices.  I also use the Swiftkey Keyboard on my Android smartphone, which has helped productivity when sending text/email, however, the keyboard on the HDX cannot be changed and Swiftkey is not available for the HDX in the Amazon Appstore.The real nail in the coffin for me was the inability to access Google services.  This means you won't have access to the Google Play store, which has a vastly improved app selection over Amazon's Appstore.  You also cannot access Google Hangouts which I use frequently for text/chat messages as well as video calls and videoconferencing.  Further, I use Google's Chromecast to stream video to my television. The Chromecast app is unavailable on the HDX.The tradeoff of purchasing another Android device over the HDX is the inability to use the Prime Instant Video.  Amazon has provided an Prime Instant Video app for Apple devices, but has not (and I suspect will not) produce one for other Android devices.  I'm not going to lose any sleep over this because I didn't find the selection of free movies and TV to be all that impressive.  The selection of free movies that were downloadable to the device for off-line viewing was even less impressive.  Most of my video viewing on the tablet was through HBO Go, Hulu+, or Netflix.All in all, the HDX is a decent tablet with great hardware that unfortunately stumbles on its software.  If Amazon were to offer a Kindle device with the same hardware, but with a more traditional Android software experience with a slight Amazon spin (a la the Samsung Galaxy Tablets), I would certainly be willing to pay a higher price for the device.

Reviews.Title: It's Only O.K.
Reviews.Author: fearn0evil
Reviews.Content: Its alright. Its not great. It's not intuitive. It has a nice picture. But  I see a lot of nice pictures these days.  It's got some unique features,  like hidden charges to remove the advertisements from the screen saver( that'll cost you another $15) . ...No sour grapes here, no...But seriously you could do better for a tablet or a reader. I won't name one but I can give you the initials....I.P.A.D.  Yes it will cost more but you can have a YouTube app if you want and it probably won't crash anywhere near as much this ...@#;/!#$@. Maybe I am just spoiled, if I am you can blame Apple.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase
Reviews.Author: Sherry Linane
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle!!! It's one of the best purchases I've ever made. I looked around and found this to be the best price.

Reviews.Title: Really useful and reliable!
Reviews.Author: Edith Reyes
Reviews.Content: Best christmas gift I've ever gotten myself. I use it daily for everything... and I don't leave my home without it.

Reviews.Title: tickeled
Reviews.Author: Adrian Ryan
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife both she and my son love it I thought of purchasing a cheaper kindle but am very pleased with this purchase and so are they

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Tirado
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit and practical functionality. Can convert to work as a stand or handheld with attached elastic strap to use on the go. Recommend this product. Priced right and delivery as described.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON'S best
Reviews.Author: Old but hip
Reviews.Content: I love it! Sure it is an access devise for anything AMAZON, but what's wrong with that? I have an AMAZON PRIME account and I am able to watch free videos all day from the extensive list of movies, TV shows, and specials. I can check my e-mail, go online, check my FACEBOOK page and choose from hundreds of free and low priced APPS. The screen resolution is top notch, stereo speakers are loud and easy to adjust. All in all a great device, well worth the low price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Grandpa!
Reviews.Author: Susan Key Shelton
Reviews.Content: Great product for my dad who had no experience with electronics! We haven't had a lot of time to walk him through some basic things, I like knowing he can get a rep at the push of a button that will help him with anything.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I understand the previous HD version had a HDMI output.  An HDMI output would have been good for the HDX also.

Reviews.Title: Small but capable
Reviews.Author: Stuart I. Riley
Reviews.Content: This is not the smallest e-reader or tablet, but the one filled to the brim with features, gorgeous display and easy viewing. Movies, books, audio, and apps all run in superior order, with the only down side, is memory expandability (an extra slot for loading more solid state memory as a card). That is a very minor factor, given its rich feature set, brilliant display and ease of viewing a movie or playing an action game.  It met my expectations and more.

Reviews.Title: Really Diggin It
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I was finally able to pick on these up when Amazon offered a year-long payment option. So far I've had a pretty experience with it. Adding this to a mainly iOS collection was a bit of a struggle at first (still is a bit), with regards to navigating the software and remembering where the buttons on the machine are. Those are obvious initial speed bumps though, and they haven't been that bad. I've been very happy with the sharpness of the screen. Very happy. Movies look great, games look great, photos and games look great. I've burned through three books on this thing and it's been great. The Send To Kindle app is such a neat thing, I've been able to send documents straight from my Mac to the Kindle over wifi, which is so simple and genius. The only thing I haven't figured out quite yet is if the battery always drains as fast, or if there are apps running the background and I'm just not sure how to turn them off completely. It's a simple thing to do on my iPad Mini. Between the Mini and the Kindle I prefer the interface of the Mini, but the size and screen of the Kindle. The Kindle is definitely my go-to for reading now, and the Mini will remain my game/entertainment machine, mostly because the app store is leaps and bounds ahead of anything else. I definitely recommend this to someone who's in the market and doesn't have a tablet of any kind, but I'm unsure if I'd recommend it to someone who already does have one.

Reviews.Title: My third Kindle and I love it too.
Reviews.Author: So.Calif.Grandma
Reviews.Content: I use this Kindle as an alternate computer.  I read books with my 2nd Kindle (white background) and what really surprised me was every book I purchased on my other 2 kindles is on this one.  So when I travel I only take the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet!
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Amazing device. Does everthing all the other tablets do. Very easy to use and helpful mayday button when needed. Good size screen and colors.

Reviews.Title: Wife and I Love this Tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas M Alexander
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my wife for Christmas.  It was a pain reading the reviews of all of the different tablets and trying to decide on which one to go with.  The screen resolution, colors, and brightness as well as the sound quality cannot be matched by the other tablets out there.  Add a google prime account to this little guy and you'll be very happy, as we are.  Can't go wrong!  Edit: I got her the Otter Box case, Marware Capacitive Stylus, as well as the rapid charger and she was equally delighted with those as well! Edit2: We have used the mayday button on our kindle twice in order to get a bit of assistance learning the navigation at first, then to get assistance when it froze up one time. Customer service is incredible for many reasons.  First, because the person helping you gets connected immediately, no time waiting on the phone, second they are instantly remoted in and can see and help you live on your screen, third, they offered to replace the kindle at the drop of a hat if it freezes up.  We decided to update the device and keep some background apps closed and see how it goes.  It is a big relief that Amazon is very concerned at keeping us happy with this product.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: love reading on my kindlefire
Reviews.Author: J. Albert "Bluedragonfly"
Reviews.Content: As much as I love paper books, I love my KindleFire. It's nice to be able to read something instantly, and I can't afford Prime but I enjoyed the free trial.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Linda Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire, I take it with me everywhere. It is nice to be able to read or do computer stuff with one device. I'm so happy with how it works and the convenience of it.

Reviews.Title: wonderful piece of equipment
Reviews.Author: wayne kowalczyk
Reviews.Content: performs as well as touted. Fun to use and the display is beautiful. It has been in constant use since received and has functioned flawlessly

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Kayo Parsons-Korn
Reviews.Content: My husband and I always wait awhile before buying new technology. Wait until all the bugs are worked out and the prices go down. I can't believe how sharp the picture is on this device. It was really easy to hook up to our wi-fi and set up email accounts. Reading is not difficult at all and we have both read an e-book now, one from Amazon Prime and one from the local library. Even websites that are not "responsive" look fine in the landscape view. Sometimes it is a little difficult to tap a link on websites, but I imagine that is true on all tablets. We read news in bed with coffee, and I use it with its new stand in the kitchen to read recipes off the web while I cook. We have even watched a movie from Amazon Prime on it.And that's one of the neatest things about it. We are on satellite, and even though our internet is fast enough to stream video, we have a usage allotment every month we can't go over. But we have a free period between 12 midnight and 5 am. With Amazon Prime, you can download movies to watch later. I believe that feature is only on the Fire HDX. But it looks like it is only true on movies. TV shows seem to be streaming only.I found the interface very intuitive and was working it right away. My husband was a little slower and bought a book for it. But then I picked up a few things I didn't know too. So it is probably a good idea to buy a guide of some sort.

Reviews.Title: Now this is something I am going to really enjoy
Reviews.Author: Roger D. Earl
Reviews.Content: I am a tv, book and movie person, and this device hits all those spots. I just tried out the Audiobooks for example, and love to be able to do something else while listening to a book read to me. Sound is good, video is great. Not bad for something less that a pound and just over 7" in size

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Willie Sierra
Reviews.Content: Freezes often & won't let you shut it down.  Also when operating a downloaded app it won't let you play the game but you still hear the music playing.

Reviews.Title: How did I live without it?
Reviews.Author: S. Simons "MOM of  SGT TR"
Reviews.Content: After having a 'regular' kindle for 3 years, I decided to update (as a gift for myself) to a Fire HDX...WOW! ...such vivid pictures, and the ability to increase the print size with a touch of my finger is amazing!  I had over 400 books on my original, and they are there (in the cloud) or I can move them back and forth. I love having my Bible on my Fire, as well as several of my favorite cookbooks. I have even downloaded Craftsy classes and view those seamlessly as I sew right along! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Fire Hands Down
Reviews.Author: David Cripe
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX during the cyber-Monday special of $179, which was totally worth it as that price.  My family has owned the original Kindle Fire the past two years roughly, and this one is way above that version.  Is it better than the Kindle Fire HD version?  Depends, but probably not if price is your biggest factor.Pros:1) iPad Contender - Seriously.  The iPad in my opinion is way overpriced for what it does.  The Kindle Fire HDX is just as capable at handling most of the same work flow with a couple of differences.  Yes, this is tied to the Amazon App store.  If Google Play was standard, then Apple might be worried.  Right now though, Amazon is crippling their own success.2) Fluid Performance - Smooth as butter.  I have played around with everything available for the past two months and it handles it all with excellence.  Games, work, reading, etc run flawlessly (app issues not withstanding).3) Screen - Sharpest resolution I have ever seen on a screen this size.  Made the original Kindle Fire look like a 10 year old non-HD television.  I could stare at this thing for days (but won't).  Reading, movies, games, etc are shown in perfect HD resolution.NOTE - The blue pixel edge issue is there, but it is not distracting to me.  I actually kind of like it.  If you read a lot on white backgrounds, then it pops out more than normal.  The haze falls to the background after I begin reading the first page of something, and I never notice it much any more.4) Micro USB Connector - Bite it Apple!  :)  No cord carousal here.  If you have a cord sitting around, it most likely works for charging or connecting the Kindle Fire HDX.  For the first time ever - a plug adapter is included!  Amazon is including a plug adapter so you can actually charge the device through a regular electrical outlet.  What a concept Amazon!  That might catch on with other electronics (sarcasm).5) Bells and Whistles - This thing has it all (mostly).  Dual-band WiFi, HD screen, Amazon support (best in the world), light as a feather, etc, etc.Cons:1) Amazon App Store (sort of) - No Google Play?  I know Amazon wants everyone to use the device for their content, but not allowing one of the largest app stores on your Android device seems illogical.  I am able to use 3rd-party app stores to upload missing apps and outdated ones on the Amazon App Store, but still!2) USB Connection Port - The connection port on the device can be a bit of a nuisance.  You have to connect it at an angle on the device (around 30 degrees).  Just irritating to me for some reason as everything else has it straight, so your mileage may vary.3) Mayday Button Gimmick - I am a computer-savvy person.  I don't need help on where to press the power button or tweak the brightness.  If you are buying this for grandma or a person that never has used much technology in the past 10 years, then this is a life saver for you (no more annoying phone calls).4) Battery - I get a couple days of heavy usage (8 hours) out of it.  I just wish I could get the Kindle reader battery life of 4 to 8 weeks.  :)Overall:This is finally the Kindle to put Amazon in striking range of Apple on the tablet front.  If you crave everything Amazon like me, then it is a no brainer to purchase this.  If you are not, then buy it anyway as you will save at least $100 over the nearest priced iPad.  If Amazon would just switch to Google Play for the app store, then there is nothing that would stop them from ruling the world!  :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: New owned a Kindle or a Tablet and got this for Christmas and I love it! It's like a mini laptop to go! I highly recommend this to everyone, it's very user friendly and stays charged for quite a while.  And the possibilities are endless!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lagerblade
Reviews.Content: Granddaughter is happy with the gift, so I am happy. The most amazing thing was I read a book on Kindle before it even reached the bookstores!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janis Ruid
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It does everything I need it to do to my satisfaction.  I find it user friendly and the clarity is superb.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device!
Reviews.Author: Melanee Moore
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our son for Christmas he hasn't put it down since he opened it!  Great Buy!  He likes the battery life, the weight and size, and the portabillity.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire. This is the first for me nd i really like it! I haven't "searched" very much with it yet but I'm hoping that will b
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the first for me. I really like it! I haven't "searched" very much with it yet but I'm hoping that will be easy too!

Reviews.Title: Its nice
Reviews.Author: Mahlon
Reviews.Content: Nice again to have an e-reader/tablet to read on instead of my smartphone.I also love the color screen for pdfs (much better than e-ink, or regular computer) for reading long pdf documents.Video is great, sound is as well, takes a long time to charge but usually even streaming over wifi and watching high def, I still get 2-3 hours out of a full charge with sound max.Also able to throttle it back decently if you turn off the wifi and brightness etc when not in use, works decently, but also don't expect a quick charge even with a high power charger hehe, I try and charge for no shorter than an hour for quick top offs, and 2-3+ hours if its more than 20% I need.All in all great device.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 7 tablet
Reviews.Author: William Lopez
Reviews.Content: I also have the kindle fire HD 7 2012 model and I love it.  Now Amazon has improved it with the new HDX and I love it even more. If people were more informed that the kindle tablets are not just for reading books but they can do what any android tablet can do Amazon would sell a lot more tablets.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: mlo
Reviews.Content: I was gifted a Kindle Fire HD for Christmas 2012 and loved it. I checked out the new Kindle Fire HDX and thought to myself I have to upgrade. I normally don't purchase every upgrade of anything electronic, but since I heard the HDX was lighter and you could mirror your pad to you TV...I was sold. The HDX is lighter, faster and slicker with the same quality associated with the Kindle. I do not for one moment regret my purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Christine Smith
Reviews.Content: I got this one for me. It is light and the HD is pretty awesome. The colors are fantastic and life-like. I can actually listen to my books or music and I think the sound is good. The woman who "reads" to you doesn't have some weird voice, but you know it is mechanical. It is not annoying. Music sounds really good even playing it without headphones. I use it for almost everything: email, browsing, games. The games are bright and responsive. I have not used MayDay as I am figuring things out.  The battery is more than satisfactory and I have found it to last most of the day and part of the night. Email gives me some trouble and I learned quickly to check it before hitting send. You wouldn't believe what I sent to someone. It is a good candidate for "Damn you autocorrect". We had a good laugh about it, though. At any rate, I recommend the HDX. I just couldn't wait for the larger one, but I find the 7 inch is just fine. Thanks Amazon. People have complained you have to use so much Amazon items. I mostly use it as I am also a Prime member, so this is a no brainer for me.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" -glare around the perimeter of the screen in book mode
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "osetleo"
Reviews.Content: I just bought Kindle Fire HDX which became the second Kindle Fire in our family. My wife was using the original Kindle Fire for 2 years and I was thinking to give her a new one and use the original for myself. We mostly use Kindle fire for reading books with occasional use for movies and other applications.When we loaded books to the new Kindle Fire HDX my wife noticed that in the book view it has very visible thin line of glare approximately 1/8" around the perimeter of the screen that is different in color than the rest of the text. Comparing with the original Kindle Fire it looks quite annoying when you read books.All other features and capabilities of the new HDX look very impressive.If you have a Kindle HDX 7 could you please let me know if this is something you experience as well or it is the specifics of the unit I got?Really appreciate your reply

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: mark heffernan
Reviews.Content: Above what we expected , Xmas gift for grand kid also cannot keep her off it, kids time was also a great purchase

Reviews.Title: What I think of the Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: ewalsh13
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my Kindle Fire HDX 7".  It is everything I expected it to be and would recommend this item to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for Crafters, Home Cooks, and the non-techno savvy
Reviews.Author: SinCityMel "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: I'm a professional by the day and artist by night.I use my HDX for all the standard applications and enjoy the usual stuff (email, web browsing, shopping on Amazon, etc.)As a crafter, it's great for using a pattern and/or flipping through craft magazines, bookmarking pages, and highlighting tips. I also have saved pdf docs of patterns and tutorials on it. My HDX works beautifully, in the standing case, on my jewelers bench for various metalworking guides and for offline use.In my kitchen, the HDX is  a recipe book,  with recipes from the internet via wifi as well as files saved offline.Basic Pros -- The images & sounds are  crisp and clear,  which is a significant improvement over the original Kindle Fire.- Easy to use & navigate for the slightly less tech savvy (I'm an art geek not a techno geek and comfortable with Apple products.)- Kid friendly, my 2 yr old niece and 8 yr old nephew enjoyed an interactive story on it as well as the usual kid games and apps.- A lot (1000's) of free Kindle books, lower priced reads, samples, and the Prime lending library for a monthly freebie.Basic Cons --My 64gb 7" model doesn't  have  a rear facing camera but it's not enough of a con to knock a star off. I use a DSLR for my art pics and my iPhone 5s for my out-and-about snapshots, so using the HDX for an occasional selfie or web chat is  great.-The battery life isn't as good as it was on the old original Kindle Fire. Since this version does a lot more, it makes sense, and because I charge it daily.  I don't have issues with it dying on me in the middle of activity.- Overall this Amazon addict is pleased! -My  new lightweight Kindle goes everywhere with me. I take notes on it, play games, read magazines and books, and the previously mentioned craft applications. I love it for streaming shows and playing music. It's a great device and IMO (in my opinion) a truly good bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Mindy Nye
Reviews.Content: The only reason it doesn't get five stars is because the battery doesn't last as long as I was expecting, and they don't have an official youtube app. Other than that I love it!!

Reviews.Title: Another great buy from Amazon
Reviews.Author: sheila Patterson
Reviews.Content: Excellent performance and I have used the camera for personal shots when needed.  My best friend!  It has stickers which are fun.  It's fast.  Can go from video to books and computer as fast as my computer.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 64gb version
Reviews.Author: Aar00
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this kindle fire hdx! I'm used to iPad and I really feel more comfortable with the kindles size. I got the 64GB version and have about 50gbs worth of documents on it but it doesn't slow it down at all. Typically I listen to pandora or audible 40 hours a week while at work and it doesn't need charged until the very end of the week if that. The only con I see is that you cannot have a background image which I find disappointing. Other than that small annoyance I love this device!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Alicia C. Lee-gordon
Reviews.Content: Love this Kindle - only down fall is the battery life when watching a movie or playing one of the game apps....Not need light to read and I am a night time reader.The Graphics are excellent....I would recomend this KindleI got this Kindle because I wanted more than what my previous one could offer and I like the Kindle products enough and knew enough about them and how they worked that this was my next obvious choice..

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet!  Better than iPad!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Allen
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire originally and liked it but it just didn't have some of the features that I desired.  So I bought the new Kindle Fire HDX and I love it!!! Does everything I need it to and more!

Reviews.Title: Competition Beware
Reviews.Author: Alex Clark
Reviews.Content: I can not think of anything more you could want in a tablet. I own the other two leading competitors tablets and am using this Kindle Fire HDX  more often because of ease of use and superb quality......Try it, you'll like it!

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!!
Reviews.Author: RJ from VA
Reviews.Content: She was addicted to the Kindle and with the Internet abilities and the color screen it would be a great birthday gift.  Price was great, shipping was literally overnight on Prime.  I ordered it Friday and it arrived Saturday,,, WOW.  Great tablet, hopefully it lasts years so once my wife wants another one this one our daughter can use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Nancy B.
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. I can read a book, surf the net, play a game or watch a movie. The sound is excellent and the colors are crisp. Still learning everything it does but so far so good. I do not get why people gripe about the special offers! I check them out every day and they aren't intrusive to me at all! I would definitely recommend the Kindle Fire HDX!

Reviews.Title: a present for my daughter in law
Reviews.Author: Live to Ride
Reviews.Content: she was thrilled to death- I gave my son my original Kindle and loves to read and was longing for one

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great graphics. Sooo much faster than my Ipad.  Couldn't be happier with the purchase. Even thinking about getting a second one.

Reviews.Title: must have if you have prime
Reviews.Author: R M
Reviews.Content: great for my kids-- free time is a great tool to teach them time management and stop the fighting... use your allotted time, find something else to do..... lots of good apps, for older kids maybe not that interesting, but up to about 8yrs old it is good. the tablet display is impressive, proprietary charger is what it is, a money maker. but the tablet is great, amazon store is growing... if you have prime you can watch all the vids, all cloud storage for music is there... great e reader for the public library(free books!!)- this is helping keep my kids interested in reading, without spending a lot of $$... also kindle first is cool thing.. we love it, just wish it had removable memory storage...otherwise for the black Friday deal it was the best.... got otterbox for my son so I don't have to worry about falls. the long and short is we can happily endorse this as a nice tablet for the price.... if you want open source android don't buy it... it is amazon like apple is apple....thanks for your time

Reviews.Title: review of 7" Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Mike Davis
Reviews.Content: I wished I would have gone ahead and bought the larger size.  I'm also having trouble viewing some news videos.  Some Plug In required and not sure how to get it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME !!!!
Reviews.Author: Rosemary DeCamp
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift and it is (as I said) awesome.  My sister reads a lot of books and I thought this would be good (and keep the book pile down a bit) ....  It is so much more however.  Easy to set up, totally user friendly and the best quality "portable computer" I've seen.  Only had it since Christmas so there are lots of features we haven't even learned yet.  Have to admit that even though I did not really need any help, could not resist the Mayday.  You see the tech (they do not see you) so feel free to call for help even in your pj's.  Little children can use any modern technology, and if you need help just ask a five year old.  As Senior Citizens if I say it's user friendly.....it is.  You do want to be a Prime member, but if you do any amount of online shopping  and Amazon is my "go to" you really should be a Prime member anyway.  PS .... get a stylus, makes it much easier.

Reviews.Title: The best 7'' tablet made so far
Reviews.Author: Joseph "Joseph Russell"
Reviews.Content: The tablet is amazing... love the OS. I just wish some apps from Google play were on Amazon store... but work around can be found to get apps wanted. Amazing quality...A++++++++++

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Michael Perkins
Reviews.Content: All pros from upgrading to the HDX from the original kindle except for battery life, but that was expected and worth the change.

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX!
Reviews.Author: twallingaz
Reviews.Content: I love my KIndle Fire HDX! I've been using the Kindle Fire for a month now and I am very satisfied with this tablet. For the money you really cannot beat it. I had been trying to decide between an iPad and the Kindle Fire when it came down to price the Kindle Fire was the choice for me. I can check my email, Facebook, Twitter. It's small enough to fit in my purse so I can take it with me to use while waiting at appointments. The set-up was so easy and I was using the Kindle Fire 5 minutes after taking it out of the box. The only problem I have is trying to get the Kindle Fire away from my 7 year old. :)

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: smiles1209
Reviews.Content: I have the kindle hd and took a lot of talking into for me to get the HDX. I'm happy with it and would recommend this to others. Even if it's a upgrade I find it was well worth it. I'm not to big on the May day but can help you if you need it.  I have adds on mine don't find it a bother at all. Have even used a few app ones.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Williams
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the Kindle Fire HDX. Very fast internet access and beautiful color display. The 7 inch is the perfect size. Love love love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Raymond Monahan
Reviews.Content: It's very easy to handle and easy to use. Down loads fast. Lots of games and other fun things to do.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: So far it has been great. It is a far cry from the its generation kindle of which I owned 2 because the charging abilities kept going out. The graphics are outstanding and it has a lot more juice in the speakers than before. Just one bit of advice if you are going to own a kindle spend the money and get an Amazon Prime account. It is so worth it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jim Colley
Reviews.Content: Buying it for my wife. She enjoys reading so thisis light weight for her to use.  Also has wifi so she can keep up with her Facebook friends.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Catherine B. Hensley
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying using my Kindle very much.  I had a problem with turning it on but went to your website and the instructions to turn it on worked like a charm.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Very good item
Reviews.Author: William Perdue
Reviews.Content: Very good item - Only negative is the inability to expand memory by adding a larger SD chip or something similar.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it a month yet but so far I like it I wanted to replace my IPad 2 mostly because of the size for taking with me in my purse much smaller and lighter,only complaint so far is it's missing a few apps I need  for workso I can leave the IPad.I'm hopeful that they will add them soon.

Reviews.Title: Suggestion
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I am still in the learning phase.  If I could make one suggestion, that would be that there should be a quick set-up help booklet/pamphlet for seniors to use.

Reviews.Title: Wasn't Prepared for Lack of Compatibility with Google
Reviews.Author: Robin Teagarden III
Reviews.Content: Ok, so I'm sure if I'd read everything about the Kindle FIre HDX before I'd purchased it that I would have learned early on that it wasn't compatible with Google Apps and I wouldn't be able to load any Google Apps without hacking it but I didn't and so I only learned this after I'd received it and attempted to load them.About what am I frustrated? The inability to load Google Hangouts, Maps, Translate and Voice, which are the apps that I use the most on my Android phone and which I imaged that I'd use just as much on a tablet, so as to save the battery on my phone.I guess that I should have simply purchased a tablet directly from Google.

Reviews.Title: Kindle 7" not up to par
Reviews.Author: AB
Reviews.Content: I like the color screen (good image) and the fact that the Kindle can act as a tablet, however not all Kindle functionality promoted is found on the 7".  The differences between the 7" and the 9" were not clearly laid out.  Kindle offers desktop and other apps but not all work on the 7".  Droid has severed its relationship with Adobe so you cannot watch videos on the 7", especially from FaceBook.  There is an experimental viewer that pops up on occasion but it does not stay.  Its a compatibility issue.  And you cannot download to the 7" to add something to allow you to watch videos.  You cannot find documents even though they indicate they are in Documents.  So far, the special offers have not gotten in my way.  I do not pay attention to them anymore than I do a commercial.

Reviews.Title: Good starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Judy Yu
Reviews.Content: Hardware is excellent. The battery life is not that great. ....can't beat the  IPad ....sorry amazon haven't mastered battery life and apps not that great....need to do more to beat the iPad even if the price is lower. I do like the size the feel of the tablet easy to travel with. If u are a reader this is great and if u are amazon prime even better. That all works great . I do love my amazon prime

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Anne Colon
