Reviews.Content: I have several KINDLES and give them as gifts and I would not consider any other products.  Buy a KINDLE

Reviews.Title: Love love love!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Darrow "NY Nan"
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about my new Kindle Fire HDX 7".  I have a 1st generation Ipad and it seems so big and clunky compared to this KF HDX.  It's HD display is amazing.  I have found all the apps I frequently use on my Ipad available for the KF HDX so there is no downside to this product other than I sure wish I had gotten it sooner!The sound is so much improved from other products I own.  The sound quality blows away my Ipod Touch and my Ipad.  I find no need for external speakers.  My husband has a 7" Android product and the sound quality is horrible on that.  The sound quality is so rich on the KF HDX!  What a pleasant surprise.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Diva"
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire I get the best of both worlds e-reader and tablet all I need now is a add on keyboard to take notes

Reviews.Title: Great gift for any occasion
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Amazon tablets are pretty solid. This 7 inch HDX works great. I bought it for my wife to replace her original Kindle fire and she was surprised with the resolution as well as other advancements made from the previous versions. What makes my wife happy, makes me happy. . Great gift.

Reviews.Title: Big time skeptic turned believer...
Reviews.Author: Herbert J. Kessler "HJKessler"
Reviews.Content: I am a long time iPad user and it became apparent over the holiday season that my house could use a second pad like device. My wife is regularly straining to read her iPhone. Anyway, I have been a prime member for a long time as well and I use the kindle app for my digital reading on all of my devices. I had the first kindle reader and I just got used to the software. Long story short, the kindle hdx was a completely spontaneous purchase and I couldn't be more impressed. Score sheet:Pros:1. Price. $200 for the 16gb model with ads. With cloud and prime, more than enough for us for a reader/surfing device.2. Screen. The clarity is awesome. Colors are solid. Really just a must see.3. Speed. Crazy fast and really responsive. Really slick.4. WiFi. Two antennas and better range than anything else in my house.5. Layout. Love the screen and the carousel is ingenious. Just a tweaked android os but Amazon did a great job making it all work.Cons:1. App store. Weak. Not as bad as I thought but needs help.2. Battery. Solid but not stellar. Haven't compared side by side but I really feel like the 3rd gen iPad has 20% more and it's almost 2 years old.I guess that's it. It's not flawless but if you like Amazon, are a Prime member, and you need a fast little internet friendly super fast tablet, this should be high on your list. Nice job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Best android or android fork ever
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: The fire OS is way better than android for your kids, this is the second kindle I bough in one month, I had to hide the old android tablet used by my kids, I prefer they use their kindle fires, I feel they are more secure with those, they use the "Kindle Free Time Unlimited" and I do not have to worry about installing applications, they install what they want (there is monthly flat fee) from the selected apps only for kids.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Ceecee10
Reviews.Content: I love it it's faster and so easy to use. I like it better than a iPad. I recommend this for everyone.

Reviews.Title: The great kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Jung
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the kindle fire hex lived up to all of my expectations. Books. E mail clarity size and weight

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Josephine Banks
Reviews.Content: I love my gift. The only problem is having to charge the battery more than I did on my older Kindle HD. The pictures and lighting is great.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Ernesto A. Torres
Reviews.Content: Great value tablet.  Beautiful screen.  The live help feature is wonderful.  The only thing I wish this tablet had was a rear camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Gift
Reviews.Author: Tom Blakney
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle for my wife for Christmas. I am a hero even though this her fourth Kindle!!!!! I think this is a great product. Now she can shop Amazon in HD!!!!

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for our children, but I may have to get one for myself. The screen size is great and clarity is awesome. The kids love it, just not the sharing part.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but good to say
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Lost my first generation Kindle and bought this one to replace it faster ,brighter ,and far better picture than the older model

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: kendra wheeler
Reviews.Content: Love it. .... No complaints!! Easy to use even for someone older and not familiar with computers tablets etc. Small but packs big power in use!

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Beverly Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the Kindle HDX. This is my third kindle, and I have been pleased with all of them. Amazon really delivers on their products!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Wallace H Ford Jr
Reviews.Content: Really great.  I upgraded from the Kindle Fire First Edition.  Am glad I did.  Watching movies is wonderful on this device.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: S. HUTCHINS
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son and son in laws. They liked it very much. Shipping was very fast. Thank you for a good experience.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: donnie easton
Reviews.Content: it's great easy to see. fun to use. It is very "navigatable" I know that is not a correct term .. but it fits.. Thank you for a  wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: It's everything I expected. Shipped quickly, and in good condition. The Kindle itself works well. The touchscreen is very responsive and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gail Oldenkamp
Reviews.Content: except for one thing:  it shuts it's self off for no reason right in the middle of whatever I am doing.  When it restarts I have to start all over again.  Is there any way to fix that problem?

Reviews.Title: I like the Kindle but...
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle but there are some small problems with it that I feel should have been tested out before Amazon ships them out to customers.I received my Kindle as a Christmas gift from my boyfriend. He gave me the option of a Kindle or an iPad so I choose Kindle because I wanted something different; we have a few Apple products already. Unfortunately when I received the Kindle, there was an issue with the volume buttons on the back. They only worked half of the time. When they did work they were kind of glitchy and the times that they did not work, well, you would push the buttons numerous times and absolutely nothing would happen. So Amazon kindly sent me a replacement. Once again, this Kindle had a problem as well (maybe I have horrible luck?). This time the area that should have displayed AT&T; 4G and the signal bars read "INVALID SIM". It would not work. So I went to AT&T; and got a new sim card and it still did not work. I returned both Kindles and decided to not receive a third.Things I did like about the Kindle: I liked the size. I didn't really want a big tablet so the size of the 7 inch was perfect. I liked the back side of the Kindle. The iPad's back are metal so I see them as being more likely to slip out of your hands but the kindle's back made for a better grip. I like the display. Also, the speakers on the back of the kindle were great! It has a nice surround sound like quality.Things I did not like: the hardware issues.Overall, the Kindle itself was nice but problems with the hardware were not okay. I did not want to keep having replacements shipped to me until I found one that worked 100 percent. I believe that once Amazon does some more work on these devices they will be really great but until then, the Kindle is not the tablet for me.

Reviews.Title: Happy, happy, happy
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: I love it. I had the original Kindle fire for 2 years and was still satisfied. I got this HD version as a Christmas gift and couldn't be happier. I love to watch movies and tv shows and the HD is really nice. The web browsing is a lot faster than it was on my older Kindle.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Kindle Fire & I love it
Reviews.Author: K. Toutolmin
Reviews.Content: I like that this new HDX version is lighter in weight because I have arthritic fingers. But, the yellow-ish tint to the white book pages when reading takes getting used to. I have an iPhone. My husband got my iPad because it was too big for my sore fingers. I went with the Kindle Fires because they have the resolution, features and price you can't get from smaller iPads. I also am a very happy & dedicated Amazon Prime user, so this is winning combination for me. I absolutely recommend both the Kindle Fire HD & now the KIndle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: pleased with Kindle, but not with camera.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the enhanced graphics and lighter weight.  I was, however, disappointed when I realized the camera only takes photos to the front.  I thought it only faced forward, not toward the viewer.  Very awkward to take normal photos.

Reviews.Title: love Kindle Fire HDX 7 (have had 1 month)
Reviews.Author: Barbara VW
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire is easy to hold and has a pull down menu on with options that could be the most used (wireless, screen rotation, settings). The ads are really not too intrusive. Turn on the Kindle and you have a full screen ad which disappears when you swipe the unlock icon and ads on the bottom of the screen when reading. Has beautiful color. E-reader portion works well. Games are a joy compared to my Nook Color. It eats up energy playing games and when Wi-Fi is on. On the web this Kindle causes a problem with entering e-mail names and passwords since the area to touch is small and very close together.  Need to remember the book you were reading because when you go to something else (games, web) the book does not reappear like the Keep Reading icon on the Nook Color works. I have been using the trial and error method to find out how things work so there may be better ways to do some  things.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Janie Sirmans
Reviews.Content: After reading some questionable reviews, I was a little apprehensive about this purchase. This was a gift for my husband, and I was afraid I had made a big mistake. However, he loves this tablet. He has nothing negative to say - no adds- no nothing. It is fast and the graphics are incredible.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet, no longer use my iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: Bobb's
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX. Its small, light and the screen is amazing. I am vested in Amazon's services like MP3 and Instant video which make it perfect for me as buying and consuming content is so easy on this tablet.The new Fire OS is much better than last year, easier to use and much faster all in all a great tablet and I would recommend people consider this over other Android Tablets or the iPad.

Reviews.Title: good choice for me
Reviews.Author: Brenda L. Lowther "Lowtherbrenda"
Reviews.Content: I loved my first basic. KIndle. And I had no problems at all with it. Now that I have the KIndle fire, it seems pretty antiquated. So, I gave myself the fire HDX for Christmas and could not be happier with it I have arthritis and must admit this is so much easier on my hands. Now I am taking care of my new grand daughterAn needed something to do while I sit and rock. A great purchase and so much fun.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx 7
Reviews.Author: Gracy Ferreira
Reviews.Content: Love love love it!!!! The speed, color quality and simplicity of it make it very yet friendly! I was going to buy the iPad mini and so pleased with the kindle fire hdx, especially the price & quality of this tablet

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Folk
Reviews.Content: The purchase was smooth and the product is awesome.  I just don't get the same service from other companies - frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Exceeding Expectations!
Reviews.Author: Alan Herndon
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is outstanding. The graphics, easy of use, and my children and wife use it all the time. We are having fun learning what it can do!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Very Happy with my new Kindle. I bought my husband one for Christmas. He is an avid reader and Loved it. I liked his so much I bought one for my self. Still learning my options, but I do enjoy it very much....

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: A great device with fantastic screen resolution and an accurate touch keyboard. This tablet made me a believer in tablets and I love the ability to carry a e the ability to carry the whole"Dune" series with me without taking up a ton of space.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is on fire!
Reviews.Author: mark lupori
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice machine. It is all that it claims to be. The screen quality is crisp and vibrant. It is easy to use and the axis to apps and other media is excellent .

Reviews.Title: My Daughter really likes it!
Reviews.Author: Casandra Slade
Reviews.Content: This was on my daughter's Christmas list and she was excited when she got it for Christmas.  Most interesting is that my 12 year son has been sneaking and using the Kindle, hiding it from his sister!  My birthday is coming up and I might put one of these on my list!  Definitely worth the hype.  It came with my Amazon information already loaded on it so we had to clear that up and get my daughter her own Amazon account - thoroughly enjoying it though!

Reviews.Title: Blah special offers.
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what it meant by "special offers". It just meant it comes with ads. And it costs $15 to remove the ads. I would have purchased one without the feature of "special offers"

Reviews.Title: Awesome probuct
Reviews.Author: Sandy Anderson-Addison
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle HDX for my 7yr old son. We purchased the Kindle Fire for my 9 year old a year and 1/2 ago and it's still going strong. No cracks, glitching. The resolution is awesome, and operating use is simple enough for a 7 year olds to figure out. The only complaint I have, is I wished I would have went for more storage .

Reviews.Title: surpassed all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Papa.Jack
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet.  Does what I want and ask and the graphics are eye-popping. Highly recommended (and I generally pass on reviews but for the Fire HDX I'll make an exception).

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expecations
Reviews.Author: Don Verlench
Reviews.Content: Much lighter than my first Kindle, the screen is better, and of course so much cheaper then the ipad.  The 'Special Offers' are in places that they are not annoying.  Bluetooth was worth the upgrade alone.

Reviews.Title: Great for all ages
Reviews.Author: Katie Smith
Reviews.Content: My whole family loves this kindle fire! Great for playing games, surfing web, reading books... Very easy to use. Santa brought this mostly for the kids, but I have used it just as much! The parental controls are great, you can block what you want with a password. I would have given 5 stars, but the camera isn't great. Wish it had a better camera and flash.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: R. Bettio "lovetoread"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my grandson and he loves it.  He seems to be able to do more with this new one than the one we bought him two years ago.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Danielle Wiley
Reviews.Content: Love it and so does my 10 year old and my 12 year old Autistic son. Fits easily in our small hands and took no time to figure the system out. Im still learning.

Reviews.Title: Nice gift idea
Reviews.Author: Army Sgt 8
Reviews.Content: Gift for my wife who travels alot. She loves it and uses it daily for work and for games on long flights. She also plays Scrabble with a friend a thousand miles away, pretty cool way to stay connected.

Reviews.Title: Addictive!!!!!
Reviews.Author: hfrefgtgd this stinks
Reviews.Content: This kindle is awesome. Although I am new to using it, the previous reviews were true. I have no complaints with it whatsoever. I personally would recommend it. I love it!!! I can't seem to put it down.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with this...
Reviews.Author: LJCB
Reviews.Content: ...I really am. I just wish it was made clearer that, even tho this is an upgrade from the 7" Kindle Fire I previously had, it still DOES NOT allow me to install flash player.  I miss out on a lot of videos posted, esp on Facebook.The "may day" feature is very cool, and it's easier to save photos, not to mention I can now take them! If I could only install flash player, I'd probably give it FIVE stars!

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: John J. Lachance "Geek Speak"
Reviews.Content: We've had the original Kindle Fire and this product is such an impressive upgrade. Love the screen, the speed increase and of course, all the amazon prime content. Bought it for my wife and she loves it though I borrow it often.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Diane Rudnick
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle! Perfect size and the colors are beautiful. Everything comes up quickly. A good friend bought two, showed hdx to me. Boom I bought one!

Reviews.Title: Amazing, Fast, Beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Arthur Atlas "atlasarch"
Reviews.Content: I am incredibly pleased.  The HDX has far surpassed my expectations and I couldn't be happier and more impressed.  A great product.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Shirley Sierak
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for our son.  The year before we had given a Kindle to our grandson (his 14 yr son) and the four of our children had gotten together and given me a Kindle for Christmas.  Which I enjoy very much.  This it appeared on our son's list.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Tristan
Reviews.Content: I received the HDX 7" with offers from a work Christmas party. So far I enjoy it and have since picked up Amazon Prime to go with it.I do also own HP Touchpad and the Google Nexus 7 (2013)Out of the 3 I use the HDX the most although I don't like the fact that my google account and app purchases don't transfer over. The screen quality is great and I am satisfied with the battery life. The ads don't ever seem to get in the way or bother me. I tend to take this thing everywhere with me.The only thing is I tend to prefer the straight android environment of the Nexus 7. Otherwise this is a great device.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted in a Tablet
Reviews.Author: SteveD "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Even though there are more flexible tablets available, the Kindle Fire HDX does everything that I want and does it well.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Paula Beaty "lilred"
Reviews.Content: I owned a Kindle Fire and really enjoyed it. I upgraded to the HDX. Am enjoying even more. The battery life is much longer. I can read a whole book without charging.

Reviews.Title: Better than Ipad air
Reviews.Author: Alonso
Reviews.Content: My kids love the new Kindle fire and I love the fact that I can control all they can see and play andset the reading goals before they can play or use it for something else.Really good device.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Would highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Maree Schiller
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. I can go onto the internet and use it just like a tablet. The quality resolution is fantastic. The Kindle is very light in weight. It is everything the spec's say it is. As an overseas purchaser I would highly recommend it. Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the commuter
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Paquet
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle.. I download movies from my prime account and watch them on the go..I love the books and games..

Reviews.Title: faster than a speeding bullet
Reviews.Author: Bubbefran "Very picky person"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire hdx. I had ordered a Google Nexus 7 older generation from another company and they cancelled my order at the last minute a day before christmas. I felt I still wanted a 7" tablet as my 10" tablet was getting too heavy for one handed use. I am so glad I ended up with this. It is all connected to my amazon account. My books, music etc. . It is  so light weight. One handed usage is a breeze. The only negative which I had not realized was that I have no access to the Play Store . While the amazon appstore has tons of apps there are still some I could not get for this one. I had spent months making progress in games that I have to access on my 10" tablet which I was planning on giving to someone else. Also there are a number of apps that say for the Kindle Fire but they do not work on the HDX. It is so new they say that I need to have patience for them to be developed for the HDX. I find this unacceptable. There are too many of these apps. Why are they not available for this fire but only the others. I am still learning some of the features so hence only 4 stars. Another negative and say this in jest is that it works so fast that when I am playing games I lose faster than before.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX good choice
Reviews.Author: Mary Hanson-Busch
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle HDX.Perfect function and size.Always wanted a tablet and I enjoy using this one.The front camera is not the easiest to use,but I was not really focused on that for my choice.

Reviews.Title: loving this over the plain KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Patty L. Brady
Reviews.Content: Enjoying this way more than just the KINDLE !! I do everything on it. I watch movies,tv,videos,I even listen to my music. I received it as a CHRISTMAS present and I am legally blind. I am able to blow up and see the screen a lot better than the KINDLE fire. The HD is awesome ....thanks to some special features I practically live on this.

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas to me
Reviews.Author: Kathy Manson
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and this was my choice and with the price who can resist.  I am a photographer and do a lot of traveling and chose this so i could just take this rather then laptop on trips.  I can upload my photos from here to my external hard drive.  I have also found i am reading a lot more just having this so easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Ducks
Reviews.Content: Like the Kindle Fire HDX 7, being a tablet it has given me hours of enjoyment.I do find reading or viewing the tablet in bright sunshine is difficult.When reading a book, I do notice some screen flicker after turning every page.Would buy again and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: It was a KINDLE or a MINI IPAD , im glad I chose the KINDLE
Reviews.Author: A. Andrews "amelia0722"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for myself for XMAS. Of course I opened it EARLY......like mid november......I priced the IPADS and the KINDLES and THE NOOKS ....and THE GALAXIES.......I wanted a new tablet........I love apple products....Have a MAC, an IPHONE and IPOD and a GEN 1 IPAD..........the KINDLE I chose for price and picture quality. I do alot of games and netflix and music. So far it has been what I need for my leisurely time on the couch or before I go to bed. AND i love love love it in the kitchen for my recipes !!!! AMAZON support is amazing and I am glad I took a chance on it. VERY USER friendly, light weight and perfect size to hold with one hand.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: taa9804
Reviews.Content: I am not a book reader, I am not sure if I like the Kindle yet, but I do recommend it, it seems to be a great product!!! The only thing I don't like is that with the camera, you can't take a picture unless you take it of yourself, or turn the whole device around to take it of something else...strange camera setup! Overall I like this product and would recommend it, especially to readers!

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Brittany Clifford
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle FIre HDX 7 on black Friday and got a great deal.Pros:Great for readingEasy to useMayday feature is really awesome.Great size for traveling and reading in bedCons:I'm not sure if this is user error  - but I've tried many times to turn off the predict text and it just wont turn off. I even used the mayday button and the text support couldn't help.I gave up on using a lot of the social media apps on this... the quality isn't the best.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Paulette Freese
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and overall I like it.  I have Amazon Prime, and purchased the Kindle with the intent to down load movies.  So far, I haven't gotten around to doing that.  It came with instructions as to how to connect to WiFi, so I got that going the first night.  I like the cloud sharing of books and photos from my phone.  Setting it up was not intuitive and I had to use the help key.  The help was fantastic, and got me set up with my books from the Kindle on my phone right away.  I chose the 4GLTE option so I could use it in areas where there is no WiFi.  I have not been able to figure out how to access the 4GLTE option.  I've downloaded several sets of instructions, but so far, no luck.  I may need to break down and call the help line again.  I'm sure that there are many more things I can do with it besides read books, but need to take the time to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome screen
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hemphill
Reviews.Content: Just love my Kindle.  The graphics are incredible!  I only wish that I could have a choice of something other than white or black as a background for the eBooks.  I'd prefer a cream color (the stark white is a bit too bright for me) with dark black text.  There is an option for cream background but it has a gray text and that's not enough contrast.  Otherwise I have no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Good Product, Missing Key Features
Reviews.Author: Tim Stasko
Reviews.Content: I did not really obtain any special offers that are useful. I only have two real complaints thought. The fact that this Kindle come with absolutely no outside camera and does not have access to the Google play store are huge flaws. I bought the unit over the nook because it stated that the unit had a camera, but did not specify that it was only and front facing camera. Other than those issue the unit is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Screen
Reviews.Author: karatemom23
Reviews.Content: The colors and clarity of the screen are wonderful. Much nicer than my husbands tablet. Got the smaller one and am still happy with it

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" is great!
Reviews.Author: Karen M Boudreau
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Kindle Fire that I received as a Christmas gift. It's very easy to use, and I like being able to read books and the Bible on it. I like having the option to use different apps on it, and being able to do most everything online (checking email, using bank apps, Facebook, etc) without having to use a computer! I have downloaded a few games, and the quality of the graphics and the sound are excellent! I also bought this Kindle because of the camera feature - I'm going to be using Skype quite often to talk to friends and relatives out of state! I guess the only downfall is that if you don't have Wi-Fi available you can't use some of the features of the Kindle. But overall I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: The kindle hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: grayboy
Reviews.Content: The sound video and color were very good.But the battery life was not that great when watching a movie.But overall  I would buy it again

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool but...
Reviews.Author: Joseph Myerson
Reviews.Content: It is REALLY hard to quit apps. It has plenrty of memory to keep everything you've ever opened up and running, but dang what A pain to quit. It is kind of counter intuitive if one is familiar with iPads and Galaxy devices to buy apps. Also it is a bit of a challenge to navigate. That being said, it is sleek, stylish, has great battery life and a decently ranged wifi antenna. All in all, a solid 4. I feel it was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Nspyr
Reviews.Content: This is awesome and very light. I have a Note 10.1 but I bought a kindle for my wife. It is smaller and lighter than I expected. Not small where it would be uncomfortable to read from, but compact. the screen is clear. The only thing I didn't like was that it took several weeks to arrive. Other than that, all is well.

Reviews.Title: no problems with this one
Reviews.Author: R. P. Lewis
Reviews.Content: We own four Kindles and they all perform flawlessly. I love my older Fire for reading, browsing the web and for watching TV via the Sling Adapter. This newer unit was a gift for my son and has even more features than my older one -- including actual volume buttons (which mine lacks). The Kindle is a terrific device for the price -- and we've not encountered any of the problems mentioned in other reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Betty D Bell
Reviews.Content: this kindle was a Christmas gift to my daughter and she absolutely loves it.  she does however have a problem with the camera part, apparently you can only take pictures that are facing the front of the kindle. this is not good because it does not seem you can take a picture of something you are looking at.

Reviews.Title: My Poormans IPad
Reviews.Author: Sarah E. "music Lover"
Reviews.Content: This is what I call my Kindle, not to be sarcastic, but to show that you don't have to spend a lot of money to have a good product. I love my kindle!!

Reviews.Title: NEAT
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: WHAT A NEAT GIFT! MY KIDS LOVE IT! Picture quality is exquisite! get yourself one today and change your life forever!

Reviews.Title: Loving this HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that it is small and yet I can still go online. I love the HELP in person, that is very nice. I don't know all of the ins and outs of this yet, but it is very useful, and will be I feel

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Kopiec
Reviews.Content: I have been a Mac person since 1984 and still love Apple, but what sold me on the kindle was the mayday feature. The picture is as good as my 13 inch retina display Macbook Pro, and the mayday thing really works. Really.

Reviews.Title: OMG
Reviews.Author: Virginia GC
Reviews.Content: I could not believe they could make the Kindle better and smaller.  A friend hooked me on Kindle Readers and eventually I purchased one for myself.  This one is truly not just a reader but a tablet with the functions of a reader and a computer.  I like the one click purchase of books and apps that I get from the amazon store.  I combined it with my prime membership and the amazing HD quality of the videos that I can watch for free is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Tone
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly...exactly what I expected.  I am very happy with my Kindle, ,and it it also very fast when downloading.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", Wi-fi, 16 GB with option to get Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: Adina Chipner
Reviews.Content: This product is fantastic! I can't say enough good about it. The only thing I do not like is it is not easy to use when downloading PDF files from other sources other than the given and having the ability to put that PDF (book, in this case) into the "Books" section. The other thing is I would like to be able to use a writing device to write my own books or to make notes on things I am thinking. However, so far so good with everything else.

Reviews.Title: Great e-reader and good tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a very nice tablet.  Once of the better 7" tablets for reading as there are amble bezel space for holding it horizontally and vertically.  If you have Amazon Prime, it's even better!  The only drawbacks are the apps, since the Google Play store is not available, there are certain apps that won't be available on the Fire.  Other than that, it's a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: I never see it, the wife loves it too much
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife is totally happy that she can read her books and watch shows that have been out of syndication for quite some time as well as play Minion Rush and Candy Crush.  We upgraded from a first gen Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Mylinda Ortiz
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle for HDX tablet. The size is great, pretty easy to use. I was very disappointed that it wasn't compatible with Time Warner Cable. TV viewing was one of the reasons I wanted a tablet, but you can download some channels to watch. The size is great for me and I'd say for others suffering arthritis or muscle disorders.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Seek
Reviews.Content: I love the clear sharp images on the Kindle Fire HDX - didn't think it would be that much different from my basic Kindle Fire - but it is.This was also so easy to use right out of the box- everything transferred easily and quickly from my previous Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: Before I got this Kindle, I had both an iPad and kindle (first/original version).  The iPad is nice, but for some reason I have always come back to the Kindle.  It's hard to describe...  I just want a device that is geared toward entertainment as well as a solid reader (should I want to).  AND BOY DOES THE KINDLE DELIVER!!!!I've been amazed at the quality products I've received from Amazon!  My original Kindle still works great.  It's just moved to my kids.  I also have the Kindle HD for the kids so they can enjoy FreeTime.  ANOTHER AMAZING FEATURE FROM AMAZON!!!I just can't say enough about how I like the Kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: Does the things it does well.
Reviews.Author: J. Morris
Reviews.Content: Great screen, great for reading books, but here's the thing - so was the monochrome Kindle I bought 3 or 4 years ago. Good browser, not great. Will not play videos on YouTube in HD and won't play videos on CNN and such... at all.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Pat's pajamas
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle - so I was already a fan. But this one is superb! The color is bright and just like the ad says - exceptional clarity. It is very fast and I use it for a tablet since it fits easily in a handbag. No question, it is a smart choice for versatility.

Reviews.Title: upgraded my kindle
Reviews.Author: love to read "Sheryl"
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my Kindle, my first was an original kindle fire.  The reason I upgraded was due to lack of space for apps.  Needless to say my new kindle has 64 GB and has been a dream to use.  There is only one thing that would make it better, it my opinion.  If there was a way to automatically create and assign collections as you purchase books.  If you think about it Amazon categorizes the books, just send the data and automatically assign.  Food for thought designers!

Reviews.Title: LOVEEE
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Billman
Reviews.Content: I haven't stopped playing and reading on this kindle since i got it. I definetly love it! Get yourself one!

Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Colleen Fegan
Reviews.Content: Love everything about my new Kindle!!! Especially the May Day button-haven't used it but a few times but the customer service people are awesome and so fun to work with!! Thank you for coming up with this idea- it really helps us that are computer challenged!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Michael Hankins
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and you can can do anything. Love watching movies and.searching the web on this device. Love it!

Reviews.Title: New HDX is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Janine K. Upton "jtenscollectibles"
Reviews.Content: Received Kindle for Christmas and immediately started uploading apps to it. The only app I have not been able to get working is the HP e-print app for wireless printing. I plan to contact the Mayday support to help with this. Would like a camera on back of Kindle for taking pictures and USB port, but I'm sure that will come in a later model.  Vibrant colors, just like watching TV. Have used the Skype app and works well.  I like the Cloud features for storing pictures which I was able to upload from my smartphone.  Have not uploaded from home computer as I have years worth of pictures and do not want to have that many on the tablet for now. I would recommend the tablet to others that may be considering the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Battery life poor
Reviews.Author: Don Burrill
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is fast. But, I am disappointed in the battery life in sleep mode. If you want to preserve the battery life you need to shut it off

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: karla restrepo
Reviews.Content: the definition is really good, the camera is awesome, is fast and the screen is really clear,also the price is really good

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Luvlunarya
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. The main reason I purchased it was for my books and magazines. My daughter likes watching her shows too!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lauralee227
Reviews.Content: Performs better than expected.  A great gift.  Far exceeds my previous tablet.  Highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Learning new skills all the time.
Reviews.Author: marge mildner
Reviews.Content: Started out mid 2013 wanting a new phone and/or new computer.  Both are operating fine but older models. Had the opportunity to play with an I-pad.  Initialy taken by the device but eventually knew that I didn't want that particular device.  After seeing the size and capabilities of the Kindle Fire HD X ,I decided to take a chance.  It has more than made me excited about my choice.  Biggest reason is the size. I-pad was too big in size for me.  Thhis Kindle is just the right size for carrying around and still having access to my computer,books,newspapers and eventually I think I'll add Skype, since all but one of my children live 2 to 6 hours away.  Made my phone and computer both better to live with without having to upgrade.  Now I have the best of all worlds.

Reviews.Title: My new best friend!
Reviews.Author: denise reeves
Reviews.Content: It not only allows me to read my books, but I've also learned how to play my games and watch my shows as well! My family is grateful for kindle e-books, the amount of space saved could now be used for other things.

Reviews.Title: Christmas wish came true!
Reviews.Author: Mary Byrum
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son who only wanted this Kindle for Christmas. His eyes lit up and he was off to his room to enjoy it. I haven't used it, yet my son says it is everything he had hoped for and more. It is easy to use, clear display and the sound is powerful compared to other units he tried out. We got the unit with the advertisements. The advertisements in no way interferes with his use of this Kindle. In fact, he says he likes the advertisements to learn of what is new and available. The advertisements only show up upon turning the unit on then go away. I researched for some time as to which one to get for my son. I'm glad I chose this one.  I would recommend it to others without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet!
Reviews.Author: Handgun Hunter
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny.  Better interface, graphics, and battery life than my previous 2 kindles.  It is worth the money purchasing the version without the ads - those things get annoying after a while.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX  is a nice investment in social media
Reviews.Author: momtosix
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade for me from my kindle fire.  I love that it is smaller.  It is a big bonus that I can take a photo and upload to facebook right now.  16GB is more than I had before.I still love my old kindle and never ran out of memory.Highly recommend this easy to travel kindle. Wherever their is WI-FI I can connect.

Reviews.Title: new to amazon
Reviews.Author: D. Tobias "davtej"
Reviews.Content: I got the fire hdx 7 a few days ago and so far I love it and am looking forward to discovering new things about it.  Slight problem I had, the fire hdx wouldn't play my favorites you tube videos but my ipad air had no problem playing them.  anyone know why this would happen. Both Kindle and Ipad say they have incredible processors and other items to make outstanding systems.  I thought they would be on par.

Reviews.Title: Amazing graphics on the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: j. king
Reviews.Content: I love the graphics and the speed of the new Kindle Fire HDX 7 inch tablet.  My kids jumped up and down when they each received this as a Christmas present.  They were glued to the device exploring all of the features including the amazing selection of apps and books available through the kindle store.  My kids being of school aged can easily use this convenient portable device for school research as well as downloading books from the kindle store at a more affordable price.  My daughter surprised me when she mentioned that the teachers were recommending the kindle fire to students.I especially like the May-Day button where you can instantaneously get live assistance to any question concerning the device.  At first this feature freaked my daughter but after getting help to rotate her screen, she quickly fell in love with this feature that is only available on the Kindle Fire HDX.  I also love that I can share my already kindle purchased books with them. I highly recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: Really like this tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Schlosser
Reviews.Content: Really like this tablet, use it every day. I use it to read books and to play word games daily.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: It has not seemed to stump her yet and that is a blessing.  I just wish she would look at the instructions.

Reviews.Title: it beyond our expectations.
Reviews.Author: Danielle M. Kopatich
Reviews.Content: easy to operate, easy to download, easy to view....thanks for a fun product....its been enjoyable to own the Kindle. Thank You

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Schwenker
Reviews.Content: Great picture for watching movies and reading books.  Very user friendly.  There are a lot of movies and book choices at Amazon to enjoy.  Light and compact.  Highly recommend this for yourself or as a gift.

Reviews.Title: new knidle
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Thompson "garyop"
Reviews.Content: like it a lot. Seems battery doesn't last as long as first kindle. But great, takes a second to download anything

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Jo Anna Chacho "JAC"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle meets all my expectations.  The HDX display is amazing for a 7" screen.  I'm really lovin' it and would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for an ereader.

Reviews.Title: sweet little tab
Reviews.Author: Dan N.
Reviews.Content: pretty AWESOME. It's super fast. Colors look amazing. Simple to use. Big plus is that I can view my school power points and pdf files !

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my kids
Reviews.Author: Kathy Post
Reviews.Content: Great Christmas gift for my kids which are 6 and 9. At the very reasonable price,  I could afford to buy 2 so I didn't have to hear them fighting over them.  They offer everything they need and more.  And, I can set the parental controls and see the free games they are purchasing in my Amazon account as well.  My only complaint is that it takes a very long time to recharge the battery so you don't want to forget to plug it in overnight.  Definitely buy a sturdy case for little ones.  I bought the I-Biason case which has held us well despite the multiple drops already.

Reviews.Title: Best present ever given to my wife!
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: My wife is an avid reader. She is thrilled to have a library/bookstore in her hands. The 7" is working great. She can read at night with the backlit display and it looks just like a book page. The wifi is fast.  The colors are vibrant. Our friend bought one of those cheaper generic tablets under a 100.00 and it malfunctioned almost immediately. If you want to take pics with your Kindle, get the one with camera on both sides. But - she has a phone and a digital camera for that!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is the Best Tablet (Not just for the price!)
Reviews.Author: Brett Hall
Reviews.Content: Great product, Great value.Kindle fire has more than met my expectations and keeps impressing the more I use and play with it.

Reviews.Title: watch out iPad
Reviews.Author: Mr. Josh
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with my Kindle FireHDX. You really can't beat this device for the money. Great picture quality and ease of use. Mayday is the real deal. Great tech support experience.

Reviews.Title: Staying with the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Ward
Reviews.Content: Since we started several years ago with Kindle we have been more than satisfied. Satisfied to the point of upgrading every so often and our satisfaction is greatly met each time. Beside the clarity of the HD series we find that they are easy to understand and the tech help available is excellent as well.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amy  Willis
Reviews.Content: We have loved it ! No complaints wild recommend this kindle to any one ,Great picture , fast, lots a fun for our whole family

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Diane Carter
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for the price. I purchased this for my grandson and he loves it! He likes to play games on it as well.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M. Joseph
Reviews.Content: My husband loves it! I only wish I had purchased the 8.9" screen. That will be for next Christmas!Kathy

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations.
Reviews.Author: CORNELIUS J TOOMEY
Reviews.Content: Purchased 32GB model at Best Buy.  Great screen, excellent speed, no-brainer startup and easy-to-use.  Highly recommend to anyone interested in a tablet.

Reviews.Title: This item was a great buy. My 7 year old will not put it down he loves it.
Reviews.Author: Kippano Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This item was a great buy. My 7 year old will not put it down he loves it so much.

Reviews.Title: much more useful than my old fire.
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Donley
Reviews.Content: Using it more than my laptop for most everything  is much smaller and lighter than my first Fire. And battery lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Angela R Nitolo
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift and didn't realize that it immediately registered to my Amazon account; Christmas morning we used the 'Mayday' button right away and within 15 minutes the support team helped transfer me to customer service(through the kindle) and fix our registration and we were ready to roll. My fiancee loves it and so does our 4 year old son. I especially like that the HDX has the camera...I enjoy the surprise self photos my son takes.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: April J.
Reviews.Content: I sold my Nook Tablet due to fears of Barnes & Noble just not being able to keep up with Amazon.  I got really tired of seeing all those free books available for the Kindle, and not having the same options available for the Nook.  I am SO glad I upgraded!  The Kindle Fire hdx (I chose the 64 gb, 7 in) is the BEST tablet out today and I challenge anyone to see for themselves how amazing it is!

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Princess "The Exceptional Lady"
Reviews.Content: Love love love it!!! This is my third kindle purchase. And I'm about to get a fourth for a gift for my mom

Reviews.Title: compact
Reviews.Author: mollysgirl
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that my new kindle is so compact.  I can carry it in my purse and it works great at the gym.  the cover I bought for it is awesome and the clear protection sheets are really nice.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Steven Distler
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire HDX. The quality of the screen is Crystal clear. The only thing is I got the 16gb but when I check my memory it only sass says about 11gb. I would like to know what happened to the rest of my space

Reviews.Title: The price is everything when deciding to by a Kindle Fire HDX; 7 or 8.9
Reviews.Author: P. K. Grogger "Fantasy Wizard"
Reviews.Content: Everything that was stated about the Kindle Fire HDX 7 is true! The clarity of the screen and the contrast and brightness of films and websites is excellent. The Internet is easily used. I just wish I had spent the money on the 8.9 version when watching films. I have not used the camera but will update this review when I have done so.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: customer
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Mayday works great.  Great video quality and fast processor.  Downloadable Amazon Prime a plus for me

Reviews.Title: if it were 4G it would be perfect.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: almost bought a surface, this is so much better.Like it better than my nexus7 and an Ipad.This is the bomb

Reviews.Title: love it, would recommed to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Katricia Scantlebury
Reviews.Content: Would buy another one, were a kindle family this is our fourth kindle in the house. Amazon needs to send me a bonus for shopping.

Reviews.Title: Good but not as I expected
Reviews.Author: Margaret U.
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle with just the e-reading ability. So I was excited to purchase the Fire HDX. I've used the email and some of the apps. such as a few games, netflix and download some music. I think the Battery length is very poor. I am disappointed that I must charge it every 6 hours of use, I expected a longer time. I would probably recommend to friends but with the caveat of short battery time.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: dorothy
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire, I am on both of them daily, Love them!  I am on Facebook daily & play games.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Michael R Jensen
Reviews.Content: I love it. it has a lot of things i can do i enjoy being able to read books and everything else

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD review
Reviews.Author: Elaine Glen
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 14 year old granddaughter and she was thrilled when she opened it! She loves everything about it but, most of all, she loves that she is able to watch her favorite shows anytime she chooses anywhere she happens to be.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brenda F. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX! It is my second Kindle Fire and just don't want to be without one. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good decision to buy!
Reviews.Author: irishjdf
Reviews.Content: Updated June 11, 2014 - I am updating this review because i don't feel it is honest. Shortly after i posted this review and having been able to play with the device for a while, I returned it for a refund. I didn't understand why i couldn't find a Youtube app or Google Earth. I quickly realized that although this was an "android" tablet it was controlled. I looked at the IPad Mini Retina and considered buying it. But there is one factor to why i wanted a small tablet. I have a full size IPad Air which is use for every day stuff. When i want to sit back and relax or watch videos b/f i fall asleep i want a smaller tablet. I have severe heart failure that was caused by a virus. My circulation is a big factor and holding anything up for a long time results in losing feeling in my arm. An iPad Mini was out of the question.  I purchased a Nexus 7 2013 and it was amazing. It was fast and light and I could watch Youtube and use the google apps, but there is no app for access to my Amazon Prime. I was in Best Buy and walked past the Kindle Fire display and stopped for a moment. What i quickly realized was that the HDX screen and colors are more vivid than the Nexus 7. It also responded quicker. An employee that was working there asked if i needed help and I explained that this was the tablet i really wanted but there is not Youtube. You can download a "fix" and install Youtube but it does NOT allow you to log into the Google environment. He told me about the Youtube Video app that he said was actually better than Youtube and allowed you to log in to Google to load your subscriptions, favorites, etc. There is also an Instagram alternative app. I decided to buy it and i can tell side by side the difference in speed and color between the Kindle Fire HDX and the Google Nexus 7 2013..the Kindle Fire HDX blows it away. I have adapted to the apps that it doesn't have because i have an iPad for backup. But so far its perfect. The sound difference when listening to music is much better than the Nexus also.The perfect choice for a 7" tablet. Remember most Android tablets don't have access to the Amazon Instant Store. Its fast, has very sharp vivid screen and images, and has all the apps you need. Youtube can indeed be run through the browser.

Reviews.Title: I'm SUPER-thrilled with this thing!
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Burton "Oddball Extreme"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my old Kindle Fire to the HDX and am seriously GLAD I did! This was exactly what I needed, particularly for the e-book I downloaded to watch video segments on cooking. The picture is so clear, and I have had no problems with it so far. I'm very happy with what I've got and will definitely recommend it to others. It's worth the money!

Reviews.Title: love my kindle so much to do on it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: easy to read love downloading so many books and games still learning all i can do on it best but i made

Reviews.Title: Everything it's advertised to be
Reviews.Author: Franchise
Reviews.Content: Firstly, I do not use this tablet for gaming or office apps. IMO the Mojito environment is the solid middle ground between Droid and iOS ecosystems. Design and form factor (7") is sleek and confomtable to use. Screen quality is still amazing even given the documented blue edges on white background (I have to focus on the blue to take notice). Haven't taxed the processing power yet, plenty of horsepower. Cyber Monday price made the 32 GB half the price of a comparable iPad Retina.

Reviews.Title: I wish I had known the LIMITS on available apps
Reviews.Author: PSTLC5 "PSTLC5"
Reviews.Content: I had been so excited to get a Kindle fire for Christmas and have had nothing but frustration since!!! I was excited partially because it was an Android based device and figured I'd have access to all the great apps I used to have on my Android phone. Sadly that isn't the case. Amazon Apps store is the ONLY!! available way to get apps easily onto the Kindle fire. Amazon should specify that it is VERY limited to the available apps. One that I pretty much require is the Weight Watchers app and it would work, but IS NOT available on the STUPID Amazon App store!!!  So basically I have a glorified book reading app which my phone worked just fine. So disappointed in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet.
Reviews.Author: silverslim
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tablet for the price. Does everything I need. Looses wifi occasionally, not sure if it's the tablet or the modem. Like the X-Ray function and Mayday function.Update:Wifi issue is definitely tablet related. Hopefully, it is just a glitch in some tablets or a software bug. There is no rhyme or reason to why it loses it??Further Update: HDX replaced, Wi-Fi issue still present at times probably a minor software issue. Happening a lot less with new unit. Adjustment of router options appeared to have helped. HDX has plenty of great features.

Reviews.Title: Needs front camera
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: Where is the rear camera?Makes no Denver to use front facing camera to take pica.good for skype and selfies only.I have seen $50 tablets with rear facing cameras.

Reviews.Title: Advertises Camera
Reviews.Author: Val Dunston
Reviews.Content: This device advertises a camera but is only one way and you cannot take pictures. Very disappointed but the support is great.

Reviews.Title: Weak battery
Reviews.Author: Charles Smith
Reviews.Content: For this Kindle to operate you tied to a power cord. It certainly is not portable. What could I be doing wrong? Or is this a weak battery source?

Reviews.Title: Incredibly satisfied with the HDX, two annoyances.
Reviews.Author: Wren Bouley
Reviews.Content: I am really satisfied with this product. I was worried whether I would get enough use out of the device to justify the cost (First tablet), but no longer.Pros:The shipping was quick and on time and the packaging was excellent.The device was received with a full charge on the battery. the charger appears to be of great quality.Camera/picture quality is great. I Skype a lot.The battery life is very good thus far. I can get about 12 hours of steady web use, 8 hours of constant streaming, and have left it idle for 3 days off charge and still had 99% battery life. I can take it to work for 14 hours with sporadic work related use and end the day with 30% battery life.The device functions smooth and quick. The processing speed is top notch.The display is so clear, HDX is great for viewing pleasure. No problems reading books in sunlight.The speakers are very clear and can get quite loud.Navigation is easy, not confusing at all.Amazon's free app of the day are usually high quality apps.Amazon also has these kindle customer only lightning deals that offer some serious value.Cons:The Device has, on 4 separate occasions, refused to respond from sleep mode. Just a black screen, like the device has been switched off, and it will not respond from pressing or holding the power button. All 4 times I got frustrated at the lack of response and walked away from it for a few hours. When I came back it worked just fine like there had never been a problem. Was not a charging issue, the battery had plenty of life left and I did not have it on charge while I let it be for a few hours.Amazon and the Google play store do not get along.  The kindle is designed to actively block any attempt to access the play store. It can be worked around of course, but it is annoying that I must do that. The Amazon app collection is not very large in comparison and leaves a lot to be desired to me.Overall it's great, I use it all the time. I want to give it 5 stars but for the two reasons listed above I have to deduct one star.

Reviews.Title: Clearly Audible
Reviews.Author: A2D1
Reviews.Content: A big challenge for other tablets in the market.Meets 95% of daily users needs.Great item to own for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Kenny Schoborg
Reviews.Content: I got into reading about a year go and decided to invest in a Kindle after talking with several friends.  I waited cyber Mon. And they had another deal on the Fire HDX.  I decided to go with the newest version and am glad I did.  I really like the May day button on it and have used it several times. The people you get to help you are easy to get Long with and very helpful.  My original intention for getting one was just for reading.  Two days after I got my Kindle the hard drive in my laptop went to toast.  It took a couple of days and a couple of times on the May day site to get it set up for my WiFi so I could stay up to date on my e-mail.  That has been a life saver there as it's been over 2 weeks I've been using the Kindle for my e-mail.  Being in my 60's the only thing I'll say I don't like is the small key board for typing out an e-mail.  It' like the young people texting and I don't care for that.  Oh well, it could be worse and that's only a minor issue.  Luckily, I work across from a younger lady that seems to know a lot about this and has helped out a lot in learning how to get the most out of my Kindle.  If you're thinking about getting one, don't hesitate, you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Fine product
Reviews.Author: David Clarke
Reviews.Content: 17 words, huh? OK, this product is all that I expected and all that I wanted. Geez, 3 more words?

Reviews.Title: To few apps
Reviews.Author: jon jones
Reviews.Content: Runs on a android system but does not allow google play. I find it very useless due to the fact that there is not many apps. I want to return it.

Reviews.Title: Excellence in the palm of my hand
Reviews.Author: Lisa Mathis
Reviews.Content: I was able to purchase this product during Amazon's wonderful Cyber Monday sale. I had read about other customers experiencing the blue aura on the edge of the screen. It is there, but it personally does not bother me at all - especially when I am engulfed in whatever it is I am reading or watching. The HD quality is splendid - Beautiful contrast in videos; it makes me almost feel like I am in the show/movie. Thank you, Amazon, for creating such a great product. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in this
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I am not very happy with this Kindle Fire HDX.  When using it, the screen will all of a sudden disappear.  Also the camera is the worst part, the camera is only on the front of the Kindle.  The only pictures you can take of are yourself because if you turn it around you can't see what you are taking a picture of.  I am just very disappointed in it for what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: Ruby Casey
Reviews.Content: Not too happy all of a sudden there was no charge all I got was a black screen with 2 little white lines.  Hope the replacement works better .  had hard time setting up skype. too many slot pop ups. otherwise over all nice & compact.  I just need to learn how to use its apps..

Reviews.Title: The regular Kindle Fire was better
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: I had my sister's Kindle Fire (older version) after she passed away.  So I decided to get one.  This was on sale and supposed to be better.  However, even after problems with my wi fi have been cleared up I still am having freeze up problems when I play a game - sometime after I have slid bar to unlock, I can't go any farther.  I have tried rebooting but it still is freezing.  The tech says my wi fi (DSL) is not strong enough, however I do not have these problems on my Nook.

Reviews.Title: Hdx
Reviews.Author: martin
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle for my boy for Christmas, and we all love it, picture quality is great compared to the iPad, price is good to, bought it on cyber Monday

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire hdx is great
Reviews.Author: co
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her new Kindle. I am so glad we bought it for her. The color is amazing and the sound is great. She has so much more storage space. I give it 5 stars for sure.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the value
Reviews.Author: Justin B.
Reviews.Content: It isn't as fluent and seamless as the newer Ipads but for the cost you cant beat it. I can see Kindle being very competitive as far as functionality in the next model or two. If they can do this and keep the cost down, the market is theirs.

Reviews.Title: 16g not enough to download hd movies!
Reviews.Author: MRL
Reviews.Content: Very good device otherwise,but unfortunately they don't tell you that 16 g (really 12gig due to internal system requirements) is not enough to download a movie in hd. Otherwise a v good device for a commuter who likes to watch a movie while traveling to and fro work each day,display is exceptional.

Reviews.Title: I got a bad Kindle.
Reviews.Author: Sharon Lemke
Reviews.Content: The Kindle froze and I couldn't do anything until the battery ran out and then I was able to restart it.  The battery charger is faulty and the only way I can charge the kindle is to prop up the cord.  If the cord is propped up I can leave it plugged in all night and it won't charge.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel Serenil
Reviews.Content: Not what I expected, camera is not adjustable and you have to play with it.  If I had to do it again, I would not buy it and I want to send it back

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx vs nexus 7
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: It has a nice picture but other then that it's not a very good tablet, I prefer the nexus 7 tablet its a droid os system, also has Google play.

Reviews.Title: Loveit
Reviews.Author: claudine traore
Reviews.Content: Love it ...but can not enjoy amazon prime because stationed oversea. I hope you guys find  accommodation  for oversea people.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Alessio Asaro
Reviews.Content: The unit has a lovely display, it's responsive and a great overall tablet. I do not like the blue lighting around the edges, it something resets and even with a black background (to avoid the blue lighting) it has a light flicker. Personally I would get an iPad but I cannot justify $500 for a tablet. Regardless if your looking for something to watch Netflix on, read books, and surf the web it's excellent.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: pancho
Reviews.Content: I loved the screen's resolution. It's amazing! I love or! I recommend this tablet .Cons. I dislike the ads.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: N. McCloskey "NJ MOM"
Reviews.Content: I replaced my old back and white kindle with the Kindle Fire HDX.  It is lightning fast and has a beautiful display.  I even used the Mayday button twice and the reps were so helpful and kind.  (no, they can't see you :)What a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Michael Hulick
Reviews.Content: This is better than the iPad mini. It's far cheaper and has all the features the iPad mini has.  The screen resolution is sharper than the iPad mini. I like the Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Wanda Holmes
Reviews.Content: So, glad that i purchase this gift for my grand daughter ! She and myself are very well entertain . Weill be purchasing prime in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Missing Feature
Reviews.Author: T. M. Massengill "navy_wife19"
Reviews.Content: I've had a basic Kindle for a couple of years now, and I really enjoyed it.  I only used it to read books, so it met my needs wonderfully.  This Christmas I got a new Kindle Fire HDX from 'Santa'.  I love being able to do all of the other things that a tablet can do.  However, my basic Kindle had a feature that my new one does not:  the ability to group books into 'collections'.  I mostly read books that come from series.  Call me crazy, but I get invested in characters.  I have several different series that I enjoy, so it frustrates me that I cannot group books in the same series to one collection.  I can have them listed by author, but I have two different series written by the same author.  After that it's alphabetical.  On my basic Kindle, I was able to put them in order.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Problem
Reviews.Author: Gran Ann
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire 4 days ago and have had nothing but problems with utilizing the audio function for book reading.  I'm not talking about purchasing an audio book.  This is the "play to listen" function on books I have purchased from Amazon which I like to listen to at night or on trips.  The audio function will work for a few pages and stop on 1 title, or on another title stop at the beginning of each chapter, etc..  After several hours with 6 different people at "Amazon assist" , I now have been told a work ticket has been sent to developers about the issue and I will probably hear something from someone within 5 days.  The 6 people have all been extremely nice, courteous and completely baffled with this problem.  I love the Amazon assist button.There has been an inference that perhaps it is a fault of the publishers causing the problem.  My older Kindle, however, plays the same books without any glitches.  Since on a normal day the reading function will be used more than any other I will be returning the product if a fix is not discovered or a replacement is not offered that will provide the service I have come to expect from Amazon.  Wow, this is the biggest disappointment so far in 2014!!  I had so looked forward to this gift I gave myself!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Paula Marshall
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about purchasing this item but once i got it I began to appreciate all of the different things one can do with this tablet but most of all i love the online help screen.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Donald T
Reviews.Content: If you are an Amazon Prime member this is a no nonsense purchase. Most apps are free. This tablet won't break your budget and is one of the best purchases for the money that I have ever made. Sound and display are great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I am not a "techie" and this was easy to start and navigate for this beginner.I had no trouble shopping and down loading or changing settings.

Reviews.Title: My 5yo loves it!
Reviews.Author: Shiloh S.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my son for Christmas. It was easily his favorite Christmas present. It's easy to operate, the images are amazing, it takes great pictures... I think it's pretty handy that I can review apps from my pc and send them to the kindle.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: mbd
Reviews.Content: for the money, i am not sure you can find a better device.  i like the smaller (7") form factor, as it is just a lot easier for me to use.  the picture is fantastic, and the text for reading is unbelievably clear.  movies are also great, and i am glad they finally have added bluetooth so that i can play it to my wireless headphones.i do miss a rear facing camera, and a number of apps that work on the older fire don't seem to work very well (some audio problems)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: JWoods "Judi"
Reviews.Content: This purchase was an upgrade for me from the Kindle Fire.  I am still getting acquainted with the features, but I would definitely recommend it to my friends and family.  The pictures are sharp and brilliant, especially when streaming a movie.  When I stream music from Pandora, I use an external speaker which makes it easier to adjust the sound.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Ruby J. DeForest
Reviews.Content: I am pleasantly surprised by the capabilities of this tablet.  It has a great picture and sound quality for watching video.As a reader it has some very nice features such as combining audio books with Kindle books.Browsing the web it fast and easy.It's was easy to set up my eMail account connection.

Reviews.Title: it ok i guess
Reviews.Author: Vandermin
Reviews.Content: It did not taste the way i thought it would very crunchy and cut my mouth. I need four more words O nope now im done

Reviews.Title: love the move to kindle
Reviews.Author: JMG
Reviews.Content: So easy to use, access apps, get books from purchase or library loan.  I Was an iPad user prior. Prefer comfort of this weight and size. Not as many apps but the selections are not bad and figure given time more will be added. This unit will pay for itself by renting college textbooks from Amazon compared to buying hard book on campus plus loads lighter in backpack.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Device And A Tremendous Value!
Reviews.Author: JazzMann "Jazz-Wine-Sun"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle. I chose the Kindle HDX over the Nexus 7  because I know first hand how well Amazon backs their products and supports their customers. The main difference between the two is that the Nexus 7 has a rear facing hi-rez camera where the Kindle HDX does not. But for me Amazon's excellent support more than compensated. The Kindle HDX is a near perfect device for me. My laptop stays in its case unused.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Alaiyah Stewart
Reviews.Content: the  kindle fire is awesome! It meets all my needs plus more. Super fast! so glad it came with an auxillary cord too. I had bought one to go with it and when i opened it i was surprised.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price
Reviews.Author: thermalhunter09
Reviews.Content: What can I say, it's everything I expected it to be.  Right out of the box set up directions were a snap and we're now connected to the www.  This is our 3rd one and we'll be back again some day.

Reviews.Title: I couldn't be happier with the Kindle Fire HDX 7!!!
Reviews.Author: jmbl
Reviews.Content: This device was a present to me for Xmas and I had no idea it was coming. I had been looking at tablets prior to Xmas for myself but could not make up my mind. Well, my daughter made it for me without my knowledge and she chose an outstanding product. It's use is very intuitive and easy to set up. You'll be surfing in fifteen minutes without the need for technical support. But, in case you need assistance, it's built right into the device as an online "visual" chat function. Getting Amazon Prime was an added bonus as I've made a few subsequent related accessories purchases that gave me free shipping. This device is "special" and very easy to use. It's very fast in all its operations and adding security to this device for your network is a snap. Those of you who are fortunate enough to own this device know what I mean. Buy one! You won't be sorry. Mine is connected to my home wireless network so I don't have to worry about data charges or a cell phone plan. Surfing is a breeze and, personally, I like this device over other similar tablet devices from other manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: deborah brestel
Reviews.Content: great change from original kindle have upgraded each year.battery life much better.will wait till next to see what is new.

Reviews.Title: aww some
Reviews.Author: don shaw
Reviews.Content: I don't remember purchasing this one but I would have had to anyway because I wouldn't have got to play on this one at all.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: Brad Batt
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, very pleased with my purchase. Just as good or even better than the Apple ipad. Very nice display

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Audrey P. Hartman
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend kindle fire devices especially HDX.  Easy to install and use and and any problems May day is there at your fingertips.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx7
Reviews.Author: EVELYN HUFF
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire Hdx7 is very lightweight and easy to use. This is my first Tablet and I found it very easy to use the apps and other functions.

Reviews.Title: Addicting
Reviews.Author: Louise
Reviews.Content: My Fire is addicting, oh no .......love it the May day is terrific, just purchased a cover for it. Amazon service is great and the Prime has paid for its self.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle. I keep upgrading.  It does what a need and  more.  Only thing I'd change is the camera on the outside for pics not of myself

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HDX 7" as a gift and I've been using it for about 1.5 months now. I haven't owned a tablet before but I've played around on other's iPads. I feel like this tablet is very comparable to an iPad but at almost half the cost, I would pick the Kindle every time. I chose the 7" instead of the 8.9" because I like the smaller tablet and I personally would never hold up something so big to take a picture, especially when I have my phone or digital camera.Cons:- There is a blue/purple haze around the border of the screen that is visible on white. It actually doesn't bother me at all but it does bother some people. I don't even notice it's there unless I specifically pay attention to it. Even though it doesn't bother me, I would rather it not be there.- Battery life isn't great compared to the iPad. For the same amount of use, I'm used to charging every 2 weeks or so instead of every 3-4 days.- I don't like that the charger is plugged in at an angle instead of straight on. It's not really THAT big of an issue but it does take more effort than usual to plug it in.- This is more my fault for not reading/understanding the Prime benefits, but you only get the benefits of Prime if your account pays for it, not when you get added and another account pays for it (which completely makes sense). I was really looking forward to "borrowing" Kindle books for free and downloading movies to watch later offline but my husband wanted to keep paying for prime on his account and I didn't want to put my Kindle under his account or have both of us pay for Prime.Overall, I love my Kindle and it's a great tablet for the price. I haven't tried the Mayday feature yet but I'm glad it's there if I ever need to use it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect in every way.
Reviews.Author: afab4
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife to upgrade her original Kindle reader.I thought about getting her a Nexus 7, they are a nice product but I am glad I bought this instead.  She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Given as a Gift ...
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My personal exp. w/ this device - It arrived in a  well designed package w/ all contents needed n w/ 73% power already - some apps r not compatible w/ the HDX that were fine on HD --Take precaution when searching 4 apps in Amazon store not all r compatible -- the device is thinner n a lot lighter - Once u familiarize yourself w/ the device ( easy 2 navigate ) - battery charge time only 4 hrs. -- the camera takes wonderful video / photos : additional options available 4 use w/ the camera -- one drawback > front camera only -if u desire front / back u would have 2 purchase 8.9 device -- pixels woo -- mayday feature haven't used it  yet -- has voice 2 text feature--

Reviews.Title: Great tool for everyone.
Reviews.Author: RSF
Reviews.Content: This device is well designed, color is excellent, good battery life, good sized screen, easy to use and generally all around handy device to have and the price is excellent for what you get.  I bought this for a friend and I haven't let them use it yet since I have been having such a good time with it.  This is the perfect device for the dedicated reader/traveler/movie buff especially with Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: D. Hickie "pooldoc"
Reviews.Content: I have the first gen. Kindle Fire hd. The Hdx is definitely an upgrade. The picture is clearer and more defined. It is faster when opening videos and apps. I like the placement of the volume and power buttons better. I like the fact that the camera is already set up to use without having to install an app to access it. Its not the greatest camera but taking pics with a tablet isn't ideal anyway. The battery life seems to be a little better. Worthwhile purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Paul Clark
